name.sl-SI: Olje Yamalube® za dvotaktne snežne sani

description.sl-SI: To vrhunsko polsintetično olje je bilo izdelano za sodobne, visokotehnološke dvotaktne agregate snežnih sani in je primerno za vozila s sistemi za predhodno mešanje ali vbrizgavanje olja. Formula za vse vremenske razmere poskrbi za izjemno mazanje pri vseh delovnih temperaturah in zagotavlja maksimalne pospeške, nemoteno delovanje in dolgo življenjsko dobo agregata.
description.en: This premium semi-synthetic oil has been formulated for the modern, high technology 2-stroke snowmobile engine and is ideal for machines with pre-mix or oil injection systems. Its all-weather formula delivers exceptional lubrication at all operating temperatures and promises maximum acceleration, smooth performance and long engine life.

description.en: Intake manifold with carbon-fibre reed valves for better throttle response and durability. Also part of the GYTR® High Performance Kit.
description.sl-SI: Sesalni zbiralnik s karbonskimi sesalnimi lamelami za boljšo odzivnost plina in trpežnost. Tudi del kompleta za visoke zmogljivosti GYTR®.

description.en: With its 3-wheel layout, the Tricity 300 gives a new feeling of stability and confidence, making it an ideal vehicle for all year riding, even with cold and bad weather. So now you’ve got a scooter that you can use in a range of conditions, we thought we’d create the Winter Pack featuring a water-resistant apron as well as a grip heater. Available now from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit these high quality Genuine Accessories to your Tricity 300.
description.sl-SI: Tricity 300 s 3 kolesi daje nov občutek stabilnosti in zaupanja, zaradi česar je idealno vozilo skozi celo leto, tudi v mrzlem in slabem vremenu. Torej zdaj je na voljo skuter, katerega lahko uporabljate v različnih razmerah. Zato smo pomislili, da bi razvili Zimski paket z vodoodpornim ščitnikom in grelcem ročk ki vas ščitijo pred vodo in grejejo. Obrnite se na pooblaščenega prodajalca izdelkov Yamaha, ki bo to visokokakovostno originalno dodatno opremo z veseljem namestil na vaš Tricity 300.

description.en: Yamalube® Brake Cleaner is ideal for degreasing and cleaning brake, clutch and other components. Its non-corrosive formula rapidly dissovles oil, grease, tar, brake fluid and dirt and is safe to use on rubber, plastic and paint.
Cover to keep your Yamaha in top condition when parked outside.

This rugged Brush Guard is designed to provide additional protection while you’re out on the trail. It was designed to seamlessly integrate with the front profile of the Kodiak while adding a tough, aggressive look.

Helps protect the front end, fenders, and headlights while complimenting the styling of your ATV

description.en: Öhlins front fork springs are developed specifically for Öhlins cartridge NIX30 kits and front forks. But they are also in itself a great front end upgrade and option to improve responsiveness and performance of the fork. Öhlins offers a wide range of linear springs to suit each individual type of bike, rider weight and personal preferences for installation into the standard front fork.
description.sl-SI: Vzmeti za sprednje vilice Öhlins so zasnovane posebej za komplet vložkov Öhlins NIX30 in sprednje vilice. Poleg tega poskrbijo tudi za odlično nadgradnjo sprednjega dela ter možnost za izboljšanje odzivnosti in zmogljivosti vilice. Öhlins zagotavlja širok nabor linearnih vzmeti, ki so primerne za vsako posamezno vrsto motornega kolesa, težo voznika in osebne želje za namestitev v standardne sprednje vilice.

description.en: Connector between the cylinder and the optional slip-on muffler

name.sl-SI: Ploščice za zgornji del talne plošče NMAX

description.sl-SI: Yamahin skuter NMAX opremite s ploščicama za zgornji del talne plošče NMAX, za dodaten oprijem in slog. Ploščici sta izdelani iz eloksiranega aluminija s trpežnimi gumijastimi vložki ter se prilegata zgornjemu delu talne plošče za noge pri modelu NMAX, pri čemer izboljšata slog in funkcionalnost za mestno vožnjo.
description.en: Add grip and style to your Yamaha NMAX with the Foot Plates Top NMAX. Made from anodized aluminium with durable rubber inserts, these plates fit onto the top of the NMAX footboards, adding both style and functionality for urban riding.
Set of number stickers to personalize your Yamaha.
description.sl-SI: Komplet nalepk s številkami, s katerimi lahko prilagodite svojo Yamaho v skladu s svojimi željami.

Z UNIVERZALNIM OBLIKOM ZA TELEFON lahko uporabite skoraj vsak pametni telefon na katerem koli nosilcu SP Connect za pritrditev telefona na kolesa, avtomobile, motorna kolesa, vozičke za golf itd. z mehanizmom za zavijanje za namestitev. Pametni telefon preprosto potisnite v etui, zavihajte odprtino in zaprite jeziček. Tako telefon ostane zaščiten pred dežjem, znojem, udom in prahom, hkrati pa še vedno omogoča enako uporabnost zaslona na dotik.
description.en: With the UNIVERSAL PHONE CASE, you can use just about any smartphone on any SP Connect mount to secure your phone to bicycles, cars, motorbikes, golf carts, etc. with its twist-lock mechanism to install. Simply push the smartphone into the case roll up the opening and close the tab. This way your phone remains protected from rain, sweat, ud, and dust, still offering the same touchscreen usability.
High-quality black finished carrier for light luggage capacity.
description.sl-SI: Kakovostni nosilec v črni barvi za lahko prtljago.

name.sl-SI: Komplet 4-palčnih drsnikov Woody's Extender Trail III
name.en: Woody's Extender Trail III Runner set 4"

description.sl-SI: Drsniki Woody's® Extender Trail III™ so začetniški karbidni drsniki proizvajalca Woody's s štirimi palci karbida 60°. To je prava izbira, če iščete zamenjavo za tovarniško vgrajene drsnike, ostre drsnike za kompakten sneg ali drsnike za večjo varnost in vodljivost. So popolna rešitev za turne vožnje.
description.en: The Woody's® Extender Trail III™ Runners are Woody's entry level carbide runner featuring four inches of 60° carbide. Whether looking for a replacement factory runner, a cutting edge in hard-packed snow and ice, or to improve safety & handling, this is the right option. They are perfect for trail touring.

name.en: GYTR Marchesini R6 Aluminium Rear Wheel (Black)

description.en: Forged aluminium rear wheel with low centre of gravity made for the R1 by Marchesini. The use of multi-directional aluminum alloy forging and the use of shapes optimized for the final geometry of the wheel make it possible to obtain a very light material with exceptional mechanical specifications.

We, at Yamaha, want to make sure that all our customers have the best experience while riding our products. For those, who find the standard seat on the XMAX a little high, we created the Low seat. It improves access to the ground, so that you can plant your foot comfortably on the road.
description.sl-SI: Pri družbi Yamaha želimo našim strankam zagotoviti optimalno izkušnjo vožnje z našimi modeli. Za vse, ki jim je standardni sedež na modelih XMAX nekoliko visok, smo ustvarili nizek sedež. Izboljša dostop do tal, tako da lahko brez težav stopite na cesto.

name.sl-SI: Komplet sklopke za pnevmatike večjih dimenzij

description.en: Yamaha has created a new alternate weight clutch kit to keep optimal clutch performance when installing oversize tires. Everything you need to change the clutch weights are included in this kit.
description.sl-SI: Yamaha je ustvarila nov komplet sklopke z različnimi utežmi za optimalno delovanje sklopke, ko so nameščene pnevmatike večjih dimenzij. Vse, kar potrebujete za spreminjanje uteži sklopke, je vključeno v ta komplet.

description.en: This polycarbonate high screen ups the level of wind protection to cover a wider area, from the rider’s upper body all the way to their hands on the grips. It efficiently reduces the amount of rain and wind that hits the rider’s body when in motion, bringing a more comfortable ride whether touring or commuting.
description.sl-SI: Ta polikarbonatni visoki vizir izboljša zaščito pred vetrom in pokrije večjo površino, od zgornjega dela telesa voznika do rok na ročajih. S tem se zmanjša količina dežja in vetra, ki trči ob voznikovo telo med gibanjem, zaradi česar je vožnja udobnejša tako med potovanjem kot vožnjo v službo.
Zaščitite svoj motor pred padci in nesrečami s kompletom drsnika okvirja. Enostavna namestitev za zagotavljanje varnosti agregata CP2.

description.sl-SI: Na osnovi naših izkušenj s svetlobnimi prečkami na Yamahi YXZ1000R vam s ponosom predstavljamo to prečko z LED sijalkami za vaš Wolverine X4. Za le majhno ceno prejmete celostno rešitev za osvetlitev, ki jo pričakujete od originalnih delov Yamaha.

description.en: Specially formulated to meet Yamaha’s own very high standards, this advanced oil features additives to guard against friction, wear, foam and corrosion. The result is consistent protection for the suspension and the delivery of safer and more precise handling.

name.sl-SI: Ščitniki pred udarci kamnov za Wolverine X2

description.en: Take on the toughest, gnarliest trails but still protect your Wolverine X2. Yamaha’s accessory Rock Sliders provide frame rail protection for the under-door area. Utilizing a full length, plated substructure, these Rock Sliders provide stylish looks while being robust enough to take on the abuse from trail obstacles. For the utmost protection, pair these Rock Sliders with our accessory Front Bash Plate, Front A-Arm Guards and Skid Plate, all sold separately. A perfect combination to armor up your Wolverine X2 for your next trail or work adventure.
description.sl-SI: Podajte se na najtežje, najbolj zahtevne poti, a svoje vozilo Wolverine X2 zaščitite. Yamahini ščitniki pred udarci kamnov zagotavljajo zaščito območja pod vrati v obliki letev na ogrodju. S kromirano podstrukturo po celotni dolžini ti ščitniki pred udarci kamnov poskrbijo za stilsko dovršen videz, a so hkrati dovolj robustni, da ščitijo pred ovirami na poti. Za najboljšo zaščito poleg ščitnikov pred udarci kamnov uporabite tudi dodatni sprednji ščitnik pred udarci, zaščito sprednje A-roke in ščitno ploščo; vsi omenjeni dodatki so na prodaj ločeno. Odlična kombinacija za ojačanje vašega modela Wolverine X2 za naslednjo pot ali delovno avanturo.

Rain and wind shouldn't stop you from activities, and neither should they affect your riding pleasure and comfort. We developed the Apron, which uses special welding technology, to keep you warm and dry, so you can be more comfortable and safe during harsh weather conditions.
description.sl-SI: Dež in veter ne bi smela biti ovira pri aktivnostih, prav tako pa ne bi smela vplivati na vaš užitek in udobje pri vožnji. Razvili smo zaščito za sprednji del telesa, ki uporablja posebno tehnologijo varjenja, ki vas ščiti pred mrazom in dežjem, da vam bo tudi v težjih vremenskih pogojih udobno in boste ostali varni.

name.sl-SI: Paket 'Sport Pack Pro Titanium' za MT-09

description.sl-SI: Vrhunski videz in zmogljivosti so za MT-09 standardne, zdaj pa ga lahko nadgradite s paketom 'Sport Pack Pro Titanium', ki je zasnovan tako, da bo vaš motocikel še bolj izstopal. Za dopolnitev hitre in vznemirljive izkušnje vožnje z modelom MT-09, titanov popolni izpušni sistem Akrapovič poudarja ikonično rjovenje agregata CP3 ter čisti adrenalin, ki ga doživljamo z vsakim zasukom plina. Skupaj z ogledali na krmilu v obliki romba, črno obarvanim kratkim vizirjem in elegantnim nosilcem registrske tablice ti skrbno izbrani dodatki izboljšajo agresiven in športen videz vašega motornega kolesa. Blazinice za rezervoar in stranski oprijem – zasnovane posebej za MT-09 – izboljšajo nadzor in stabilnost pri vožnji v ovinkih, hkrati pa ščitijo rezervoar pred praskami. Ste pripravljeni, da svojo vožnjo popeljete na naslednjo raven?
description.en: Class-leading looks and performance are standard on the MT-09, but now you can take it to the next level with the Sport Pack Pro Titanium, designed to make your bike stand out from the crowd even more. To complement the fast and thrilling experience of riding the MT-09, the titanium Akrapovič Full Exhaust System accentuates the CP3’s iconic roar, emphasising the pure adrenaline delivered with every twist of the throttle. Together with the diamond-shaped bar end mirrors, black-tinted fly screen and a sleek licence plate holder, these carefully selected accessories enhance your bike’s sharp and sporty looks. Finally, the tank pad and side grip pads—designed specifically for the MT-09—improve control and stability when tackling corners, while also protecting the tank from scratches. Are you ready to push your ride to the next level?

You may want to use your NMAX throughout the year for your commutes. And we want to make sure you ride with utmost comfort, which not only makes your ride pleasurable but also a whole lot more comfortable. In order to keep you protected from the elements, we created the Winter pack for NMAX, consisting of an apron and a grip heater. While the Apron protects your feet from the rain and cold winds, it also has a reflective logo that increases your visibility. The grip heater get plenty warm, to keep your hands toasty. Available now from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit these high quality Genuine Accessories to your NMAX.
description.sl-SI: Mogoče se boste želeli s svojim NMAX voziti celo leto. Želimo poskrbeti, da se boste vozili kar se da udobno, zaradi česar ne bo vožnja le v užitek, ampak bo tudi precej bolj udobna. Da bi vas zaščitili pred vremenom, smo ustvarili zimski paket za NMAX, ki je sestavljen iz predpasnika in grelnika ročk. Predpasnik ščiti noge pred dežjem in hladnim vetrom ter je opremljen z odsevnim logotipom, zaradi katerega boste bolj opazni. Grelnik ročk pa se segreje in poskrbi, da so roke tople. Obrnite se na pooblaščenega prodajalca izdelkov Yamaha, ki bo to visokokakovostno originalno dodatno opremo z veseljem namestil na vaš model NMAX.

With its solvent-free formula, Yamalube Bike Cleaner gel is the best way to clean your bike or eBike and keep it looking as good as new. The special gel gets right into the mud and dirt and gently loosens it, making your bike easy to wash off. Its specially blended specification leaves a sparkling residue-free finish on all surfaces including carbon – and its pad-friendly design maintains your braking performance.
description.sl-SI: Čistilni gel Yamalube za kolo s formulo brez topil je najboljši način za čiščenje vašega kolesa ali kolesa eBike, saj pripomore k ohranjanju njegovega videza. Posebni gel prodre naravnost v blato in umazanijo ter ju nežno sprosti, zaradi česar kolo enostavno sperete. S posebno mešanico so vse površine bleščeče obdelane in brez ostankov, vključno z ogljikom – zasnova, prijazna oblogi, ohranja zmogljivost zavor.

name.sl-SI: Dirkaški komplet GYTR® prve stopnje – modelno leto 2019–trenutni model

description.en:
The GYTR® Racing Kit stage 1 (MY19-Current) includes all mandatory equipment based on the FIA (Fédération Internationale de l’Automobile) T4 regulations for Side-by-Sides. Equipped with this kit, the YXZ1000R is ready to compete in most competitions under National Sports Authorities and FIM.
Thanks to the plug-and-play design, no welding or modifications to the chassis are required. Together with the full assembly instructions, this allows any Yamaha SSV dealer or experienced mechanic to finish installation in about 16 hours.
The GYTR Racing Kit opens up a new world of Rally racing and offers a strong base for further improving skills and vehicle performance, for entry-level and experienced drivers.
This Stage 1 kit is developed for models with a rear-mounted radiator and is suitable for YXZ1000R models after and including MY2019.

The kit contains:
description.sl-SI:
Dirkaški komplet GYTR® prve stopnje (modelno leto 2019–trenutni model) vključuje vso potrebno opremo na osnovi FIA (Fédération Internationale de l’Automobile) pogojev T4 za modele Side-by-Side. Model YXZ1000R, opremljen s tem kompletom, je pripravljen za tekmovanje v večini tekmovanj pod okriljem nacionalnih športnih organov in FIM.
Zahvaljujoč preprosti zasnovi ni potrebno varjenje ali izvajanje modifikacij na šasiji. V kompletu s popolnimi navodili za sestavljanje lahko vsak prodajalec Yamahe SSV ali izkušen mehanik zaključi namestitev v približno 16-ih urah.
Dirkaški komplet GYTR odpira nov svet reli dirkanja ter ponuja močno podlago za nadaljnje izboljšanje spretnosti in zmogljivosti vozila, tako začetnikom kot tudi izkušenim voznikom.
Ta komplet prve stopnje je razvit za modele z zadaj nameščenim hladilnikom in je primeren za YXZ1000R od vključno modelnega leta 2019 naprej.

Komplet vsebuje:

description.en: A multi-talented oil developed specially to cope with the unforgiving operating conditions of the hard-working scooter transmission. Constant full speed start-ups and stops in city traffic put heavy demands on gearbox and oil, but this formula makes light work of it.

description.en: Embrace the racer heritage of the XSR900 and prepare your bike for the most sportiest riding. The smooth pack ensures a great melodical roar coming from the Akrapovič while the all-black brake and clutch levers style your handlebar. Protect your engine with the well-designed side sliders while cleaning up the front and back end with the aluminum front fender and super sporty license plate holder. The ultimate pack to make a mark.
description.sl-SI: Začutite dirkaški duh modela XSR900 in pripravite svoje motorno kolo za kar se da športno vožnjo. Paket 'Smooth' prinaša močan, melodičen zven Akrapovičevega izpušnega sistema, medtem ko krmilo elegantno dopolnjujejo povsem črne ročice za zavoro in sklopko. Zaščitite agregat z lično oblikovanimi stranskimi ščitniki ter ustvarite čist videz sprednjega in zadnjega dela z aluminijastim sprednjim blatnikom in zelo športnim nosilcem registrske tablice. Popoln paket za puščanje nepozabnega vtisa.

description.en:
Chains live a tough, dangerous and extremely stressful life! Road dust, grit and debris cling to the chain lubricant, creating a deadly ‘grinding paste’ that can considerably reduce the life of both the chain and the drive sprockets.
This quick and effective spray removes the dirt and heavy grease deposits while still protecting the O-rings and fighting corrosion for the future, and remember, a clean chain is a smoother-running chain.
description.sl-SI:
Verige za časa svoje življenjske dobe delujejo v težkih, nevarnih in zelo stresnih okoliščinah. Cestni prah, pesek in ostanki, ki se držijo maziva za verige, ustvarijo smrtno nevarno »pasto za brušenje«, ki lahko znatno skrajša življenjsko dobo verige in pogonskih zobnikov.
To hitro in učinkovito pršilo odstrani umazanijo in večje obloge maščobe, pri tem pa vseeno ščiti O-tesnila in se bori proti koroziji. Ne pozabite, če je veriga čista, bolj gladko teče.

description.en: Manufactured to Yamaha’s specification by VP components, the VICE platform pedal set gives you better power transfer and a greater range of foot and body positions for enhanced stability and stronger performance on the downhill or trail. With a flat surface equipped with 12 replaceable grip pins per side, these pedals enable you to get the most out of your Moro 07. Featuring a durable extruded and CNC machined aluminum body with LSL and sealed ball bearings, the VICE platform pedal set provides increased performance with superb durability.
description.sl-SI: Komplet platformnih pedalov VICE, ki jih po Yamahinih specifikacijah izdeluje podjetje VP Components, omogoča boljši prenos moči ter večji razpon položajev stopal in telesa za izboljšano stabilnost, kakor tudi večjo zmogljivost pri spuščanju po hribih ali vožnji po stezah. Ti pedali s plosko površino, ki imajo na vsaki strani 12 zatičev za oprijem, omogočajo, da kar najbolje izkoristite model Moro 07. Komplet platformnih pedalov VICE zagotavlja večjo zmogljivost in odlično vzdržljivost, saj ima trpežno aluminijasto ohišje, izdelano s strojem CNC, ter zatesnjene kroglične ležaje in ležaje LSL.

description.en: The ideal multi-purpose 4-stroke oil, formulated to perform and protect under all normal conditions, for sports, road and off-road bikes, trail machines, scooters, ATVs and quads. Available in 20W-50 grade, a special formulation for big-bore and high mileage engines..
description.sl-SI: To popolno večnamensko olje za 4-taktne agregate je izdelano za delovanje in zaščito v vseh običajnih pogojih, za športna, cestna in terenska motorna kolesa, vozila za teren, skuterje, ATV-je in štirikolesnike. Na voljo v različici 20W-50, ki ima edinstveno formulo za agregate z velikimi vrtinami valjev in z velikim številom kilometrov.

The city is the XMAX's natural habitat and with the Urban Accessories Pack you can take the practicality of your XMAX a notch higher. Besides providing enhanced wind protection from the high screen, the pack also takes care of your luggage needs with a 45L top case with matching colour plate set and carrier – keeping your belonging safe and secure. And a backrest for the top case makes sure the passenger has an equally comfortable ride. To protect you from the scratches and the scruffs, the city throws up, the pack contains the XMAX scratch protector. Available from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit these high quality Genuine Accessories to your XMAX.
description.sl-SI: Mesto je XMAX-ovo naravno okolje, s kompletom dodatne opreme Urban pa lahko še bolje izkoristite XMAX-ovo praktičnost. Poleg izboljšane zaščite pred vetrom z visokim vizirjem paket poskrbi tudi za vaše potovalne potrebe s 45-litrskim zgornjim kovčkom z ujemajočim se kompletom barvnih ploščic in nosilcem, ki ščiti vaše osebne predmete. Naslon za zgornji kovček pa poskrbi, da bo tudi sopotnik užival v enako udobni vožnji. Za zaščito pred praskami in odrgninami komplet vključuje zaščito pred praskami XMAX. Obrnite se na pooblaščenega prodajalca izdelkov Yamaha, ki bo to visokokakovostno originalno dodatno opremo z veseljem namestil na vaše vozilo XMAX.

description.en: Öhlins STX gives a smoother, more controlled and enjoyable ride when riding solo or with passenger/heavy load . The series are monotube high pressure gas type of shock absorber with external “piggy back” reservoir which provides a higher performance capability. This makes your ride more accurate and reliable. The Öhlins STX 36 shock absorber sets the standard for performance, quality and durability for your NMAX.

Serijo sestavljajo enocevni visokotlačni plinski blažilniki z zunanjim rezervoarjem plina, ki omogoča boljše zmogljivosti. S tem je vaša vožnja natančnejša in bolj zanesljiva. Blažilnik Öhlins STX 36 določa standard za zmogljivost, kakovost in vzdržljivost za vaš motocikel NMAX.

Razvito za verigi O-ring in X-ring terenskih motorjev, posebna lepljiva formula zagotavlja podmazano folijo, odporno na udarce, ki lahko prenese izjemno visoke pritiske, kar omogoča vašemu motornemu kolesu doseganje najvišjih zmogljivosti ter optimalno učinkovitost goriva.

name.sl-SI: Dirkalni komplet GYTR® prve stopnje – modelno leto 2016–2018

description.en:
The GYTR® Racing Kit Stage 1 (MY16-MY18) includes all mandatory equipment based on the FIA (Fédération Internationale de l’Automobile) T4 regulations for Side-by-Sides. Equipped with this kit, the YXZ1000R is ready to compete in most competitions under National Sports Authorities and FIM.
Thanks to the plug-and-play design, no welding or modifications to the chassis are required. Together with the full assembly instructions, this allows any Yamaha SSV dealer or experienced mechanic to finish installation in about 16 hours.
The GYTR Racing Kit opens up a new world of Rally racing and offers a strong base for further improving skills and vehicle performance, for entry-level and experienced drivers.
This Stage 1 kit is developed for models with a front-mounted radiator and is suitable for YXZ1000R models from MY2016 – MY2018.

This kit includes:
description.sl-SI:
Dirkaški komplet GYTR® prve stopnje (modelno leto 2016–2018) vključuje vso potrebno opremo na osnovi FIA (Fédération Internationale de l’Automobile) pogojev T4 za modele Side-by-Side. Model YXZ1000R, opremljen s tem kompletom, je pripravljen za tekmovanje v večini tekmovanj pod okriljem nacionalnih športnih organov in FIM.
Zahvaljujoč preprosti zasnovi ni potrebno varjenje ali izvajanje modifikacij na šasiji. V kompletu s popolnimi navodili za sestavljanje lahko vsak prodajalec Yamahe SSV ali izkušen mehanik zaključi namestitev v približno 16-ih urah.
Dirkaški komplet GYTR odpira nov svet reli dirkanja ter ponuja močno podlago za nadaljnje izboljšanje spretnosti in zmogljivosti vozila, tako začetnikom kot tudi izkušenim voznikom.
Ta komplet prve stopnje je razvit za modele s spredaj nameščenim hladilnikom in je primeren za YXZ1000R od modelnega leta 2016 do modelnega leta 2018.

Ta komplet vključuje:

description.en: Take your Ténéré to next level with the GYTR Performance Kit. Boosting power by up to 9 HP, this upgrade features a lightweight race exhaust system from Akrapovič, as well as the GYTR ECU and air filter kit that further enhance performance. And for improved control in the most challenging terrain, the GYTR footrest set is designed to facilitate grip and reduce mud cumulation. The final component in the Performance kit is a clutch cover upgrade, with a GYTR branded billet aluminium split cover allowing easy access to the clutch's inner workings for quick servicing between rally stages. Easy to install by retaining stock components, it's the must-have enhancement for your off-road racing experience.

name.en: Öhlins Cartridge Kit NIX30 for R7
name.sl-SI: Komplet vložkov Öhlins NIX30 za R7

description.en: The Road&Track 30 mm front fork cartridge kit from Öhlins is based on experience gained from World Supersport and  Superstock Championships. It doesn’t matter if you are heading for a National Road Racing title or if you are taking your bike to the local race track. This cartridge kit will give you loads of performance, stable damping characteristics and fantastic comfort. The kit has a unique design with compression damping and the adjustment on the left leg and rebound damping and the adjustment on the right leg – so all adjustments are made at the top together with the spring preload.
description.sl-SI: Komplet vložkov za sprednje vilice Road&Track 30 mm Öhlins temelji na izkušnjah, pridobljenih na svetovnem prvenstvu Supersport in prvenstvih Superstock. Ni pomembno, ali se borite za naslov državnega prvaka v motociklizmu ali pa z motornim kolesom dirkate na lokalnem dirkališču. Ta komplet vložkov vam zagotavlja boljše zmogljivosti, zanesljivo blaženje in izredno udobje. Komplet ima edinstveno zasnovo s kompresijskim blaženjem in nastavitvijo za levo nogo ter povratnim blaženjem in nastavitvijo za desno nogo – vse nastavitve lahko prilagajate na zgornjem delu, hkrati z nastavitvijo trdote vzmetenja.

Komplet je na voljo v dveh barvah: ena je črna, ki predstavlja znamki Yamaha in Yamalube, druga pa modra »Paddock Blue«, ki predstavlja znamki Yamaha Racing in GYTR – tako lahko krmilo preprosteje prilagodite.

description.sl-SI: Če želite svoj MT-03 povzdigniti na višjo raven, se odločite za skrbno izbrano dodatno opremo kompleta Yamaha Sport Pack. Obrnite se na pooblaščenega prodajalca izdelkov Yamaha, ki bo to visokokakovostno originalno dodatno opremo z veseljem namestil na vaše motorno kolo.
description.en: If you want to take your MT-03 to the next level, the carefully selected accessories of the Yamaha Sport Pack are the way to go. Consisting of a sport screen, quickshifter, tank pad, licence plate holder and chain guard, the Sport Pack gives your MT-03 an even more aggressive look and a sharper feel. Available now from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit these high quality Genuine Accessories to your motorcycle.

description.en: Made out of heavy duty plastic, these bags are designed to hold shape and stand up on their own. After a day of boating, cleanse your engine with fresh water. Just fill the bag until the water passes the intake inlets and idle your engine in neutral for 5 to 10 minutes. Finally, unscrew the drain plug and let the water flow out.

description.sl-SI: Olje Yamalube® RS4GP 10W40 je visokozmogljivo motorno olje za štiritaktna dirkalna motorna kolesa, razvito z enako tehnologijo kot Yamahino olje za tekmovanja v razredu MotoGP. Zagotavlja odlično zaščito in zmogljivost motorja v normalnih in ekstremnih pogojih vožnje.
description.en: Yamalube® RS4GP 10W40 Oil is a high-performance 4-stroke racing oil developed with the cutting-edge technology of the Yamaha Factory Racing MotoGP oil. Provides excellent engine protection and performance under normal and extreme riding conditions.

description.sl-SI: Dopolnite svoje vožnje z zadnjim nosilcem. Vzemite zgornje kovčke, prtljago in še več, kamor koli greste.

Control your EcoXgear Speakers or Subwoofer with this convenient remote. It pairs with the existing 2020 and later FX/VX/EX Marine speakers and the 2019 FX/VX/EX speakers. It works in conjunction with, or without the 2021 Subwoofer.

Združljiv je z obstoječimi zvočniki za plovila FX/VX/EX iz leta 2020 in novejšimi ter zvočniki za FX/VX/EX iz leta 2019. Deluje v kombinaciji z globokotonskim zvočnikom iz leta 2021 oz. brez njega.

description.sl-SI: Ekskluzivna zasnova in izdelava iz visokokakovostnih materialov – ta vrhunski udoben sedež poskrbi za še bolj sproščeno in prijetno vožnjo.

Paket Style daje vašemu modelu R7 še privlačnejši profil na cesti in poskrbi za še večje navdušenje nad tem kompaktnim supersport motorjem.  Ta paket originalnih dodatkov vsebuje sistem hitrega prestavljanja, ki omogoča prestavljanje brez sklopke za še hitrejše in enakomernejše pospeševanje. Zatemnjen športni vizir in lahek nosilec registrske tablice dajeta vašemu R7 še bolj dinamičen videz – stranske obloge rezervoarja za gorivo pa omogočajo boljši nadzor nad motociklom. Za osvetlitev poskrbijo natančno zasnovani zaporedni LED-smerniki spredaj in zadaj, ki zagotavljajo boljšo vidljivost in estetsko privlačnost. Ščitnik ročice sprednje zavore v dirkaškem slogu pa kaže na čistokrvno dirkaško DNK. Obrnite se na pooblaščenega prodajalca izdelkov Yamaha, ki bo to visokokakovostno originalno dodatno opremo v paketu Style za R7 z veseljem namestil na vaše motorno kolo.
description.en: The Style Pack gives your R7 an even sharper profile on the street and increases the thrill factor of this slim-lined Supersport!  This Genuine Accessories pack comes with a quick shifter that enables clutchless gear shifting for even faster and smoother acceleration. The dark-smoked sport screen and lightweight license plate holder give a more dynamic look to your R7 – while the tank side grip pads provide you with extra controllability. Illuminate your journey with precision-engineered Sequential LED Blinker sets on both front and rear, for enhanced visibility and aesthetic appeal. While the racing-style billet front brake lever guard shows its pure race-bred DNA. Available now from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit the high quality Genuine Accessories in this R7 Style Pack to your motorcycle.

description.sl-SI: Uporabite protivibracijski modul SP Connect™, da dodatno zmanjšate vibracije za različne frekvenčne razpone. Razvoj tega novega izdelka je odziv na kompleksnost novejših modelov pametnih telefonov, pri katerih so fotoaparati sestavljeni iz močno občutljivih sestavnih delov. Posebej razviti elastomer blaži premike v vseh smereh in zaustavi do 60 % vibracij (npr. iz agregata motocikla), ki bi lahko vplivale na mehanski stabilizator slike fotoaparata. Vaš pametni telefon je tako zaščiten in ostaja stabilen ter varno nameščen, tako da lahko med potjo navigacijo preprosto uporabljate.
description.en: Use the SP Connect™ Anti Vibration Module to further reduce vibrations for a variety of frequency ranges. The development of this new product is a reaction to the complexity of newer smartphone models, whose camera systems consist of increasingly sensitive components. The specially developed elastomer inlay dampens in all directions and stops up to 60% of vibrations (e.g. from the motorcycle engine) that could affect the mechanical image stabilizer of the camera. This not only protects your smartphone, but it remains stable and securely mounted so that you can easily navigate while on the road.

No holes to drill, no tools required, no scratching! Attaches to any clean, smooth, non-porous surface. Dash, console, or windshield mount. Fully adjustable 10,1cm x 20,3cm mirror.

description.en: The ultimate Travel gear for your TRACER 9 to hit the road in full functional style. The High screen, the Add-on Wide Screen and Heated Comfort Seat provide the extra comfort for those long endless roads. The Top Case gives you the perfect tool to take your belongings along with you on your endeavors combined with the stylish Side Cases of the TRACER 9 GT. Charge your phone easily with the USB Charger while you , keep an eye on your tire pressure with the Tire Pressure Monitoring tool. The pack also has a dedicated GPS stay to help you clamp your GPS securely. The Side Stand Extension gives your motorcycle more stability on any surface when parked, the Radiator Guard protects your radiator against those pesky stones and loose gravel that are in your trail, while the Engine guard gives protection against unintended falls. The LED Fog Lights increase visibility in bad weather conditions for optimal safety. While you enjoy your ride, we made sure your passenger is pampered as well. They will enjoy the comfort of the Passenger Comfort Seat and the Backrest.
description.sl-SI: Najboljša potovalna oprema za vaš TRACER 9. Odpravite se na pot z uporabnim slogom. Visok zaščitni vizir, dodaten širok zaščitni vizir, ogrevane ročke in ogrevan udoben sedež za več udobja na dolgih neskončnih cestah. Zgornji kovček je v kombinaciji s stranskima kovčkoma TRACER 9 GT popolno orodje za prevoz lastnine na popotovanjih. Telefon lahko enostavno napolnite s polnilnikom USB med uporabo orodja za nadzor tlaka v pnevmatikah. Paket ima tudi namenski nosilec za GPS, ki omogoča varno pritrditev navigacije. Zaradi podaljška stranskega nosilca je parkirani motocikel stabilnejši na vseh površinah, zaščita hladilnika ščiti hladilnik pred nadležnimi kamenčki in peskom, ki se znajdejo na poti, zaščita agregata pa nudi zaščito pred neželenimi padci. Za boljšo varnost poskrbijo LED meglenke, ki izboljšajo vidljivost v slabem vremenu. Poskrbeli smo, da med vožnjo ne boste uživali le vi, ampak tudi sopotnik. Sopotniki lahko uživajo v udobju, ki ga nudita udoben sovoznikov sedež in naslonjalo.

description.en:
Fuel your passion for paddling with the Yamaha Telescopic Paddle. Its adaptable design and effortless adjustment let you focus on the joy of the journey.

Effortlessly adjust your paddle length from 50 to 114 cm with a simple twist for optimal paddling in any situation. 
The lightweight design allows convenient storage under boat seats or in WaveRunner compartments thanks to the aluminium shaft that cleverly hides inside the blade. 
Built to last, the paddle features a corrosion-resistant aluminium shaft, a hassle-free locking mechanism, and a high-impact moulded blade and boat hook handle.
Fully adjustable add-on screen to increase weather protection

Nadgradite svoj TRACER 9 GT+ s 'Travel Pack Pro' za neprimerljivo udobje in funkcionalnost. Visok vizir in dodaten širok zaščitni vizir omogočata boljšo zaščito pred vetrom, ogrevan udoben sedež in sedež za sopotnika pa zagotavljata udobno vožnjo. Ostanite obveščeni s sistemom za nadzor tlaka v pnevmatikah (TPMS) in kompletom za nadzor tlaka v pnevmatikah. Zaščitite motorno kolo s ščitnikom hladilnika in zaščito agregata 'Explorer' ter povečajte vidljivost s kompletom meglenk LED. Zavarujte opremo z nosilno ploščo za zgornji kovček, zgornjim kovčkom in naslonom. Ta paket združuje vrhunske funkcije za vrhunsko potovalno izkušnjo.
description.en: Upgrade your TRACER 9 GT+ with the Travel Pack Pro for unmatched comfort and functionality. The High Screen and Add-On Wide Screen enhance wind protection, while the Heated Comfort Seat and Passenger Seat ensure a cozy ride. Stay informed with the TPMS and Tire Pressure Monitoring Kit. Protect your bike with the Radiator Guard, Explorer Engine Guard, and add visibility with the LED Fog Light Kit. Secure your gear with the Top Case Mounting Plate, Top Case, and Backrest. This pack combines premium features for a superior travel experience.

Ténéré 700 is built to take you off the beaten track and move you over to new horizons. The Explorer Pack contains the complete ensemble of accessories to support this journey of discovery. The aluminium side cases with 72L capacity ensure you have enough space to pack up and go at a moment's notice. To carry even extra luggage, the Explorer Pack features an easily mountable mono seat rack, with flat surface, that allows faster setting up of additional bags. With all that luggage, it's imperative to have good bike stability when parked and that's why the Explorer Pack is equipped with a center stand. For added protection, the pack also features a skid plate and an engine guard, so your Ténéré 700 can withstand those long-distance travels. Are you ready to make the next horizon yours?
description.sl-SI: Ténéré 700 je ustvarjen, da vas odpelje z običajnih cest in vam odpre nove svetove. Paket Explorer vsebuje vso dodatno opremo, ki jo potrebujete za take raziskovalne izlete v neznano. Aluminijasta kovčka s prostornino 72 litrov vam zagotavljata dovolj prostora za prtljago, zato se lahko na pot odpravite brez posebnih priprav. Paket Explorer vsebuje še prtljažnik za dodatno prtljago za enojni sedež, ki ga lahko preprosto namestite, na njegovo ravno površino pa lahko hitro pritrdite dodatne torbe. Vsa ta količina prtljage zahteva tudi stabilno parkiranje, zato je paket Explorer opremljen tudi s sredinskim stojalom. Za dodatno zaščito paket vključuje še ščitno ploščo in ščitnik motorja, da vaš Ténéré 700 prenese tudi najdaljša potovanja. Ste pripravljeni, da osvojite naslednje obzorje?

Naš ogrevan sedež, ki je kot nalašč za zgodnje jutranje vožnje ali hladna večerna križarjenja, spremeni vaš skuter v prevozno sredstvo za celo leto.
description.en: Say goodbye to chilly rides! Whether you're commuting through the city or exploring new routes, our heated seat keeps you warm and cozy. Perfect for early morning rides or those chilly evening cruises, our heated seat transforms your scooter into a year-round ride.

name.sl-SI: Dirkalni komplet GYTR® druge stopnje FIA

description.en:
The GYTR® Racing Kit Stage 2 FIA is additional to the GYTR Racing Kit Stage 1 (2HCRALLYKT01 / B5HRALLYKT01) and includes those items that are mandatory for the FIA European or World Cross-country cups. With both kits installed, the YXZ1000R complies fully with the FIA T4 requirements. The Stage 2 kit includes plug-and-play fuel cells, an automatic fire extinguisher system and an additional bulkhead section behind the seats.

This kit includes:
description.sl-SI:
Dirkalni komplet GYTR® druge stopnje, skladen s predpisi FIA, je dodatek za dirkalni komplet GYTR prve stopnje (2HCRALLYKT01/B5HRALLYKT01), ki vključuje elemente, obvezne za terenske dirke v okviru evropskega in svetovnega pokala FIA. Po namestitvi obeh kompletov vozilo YXZ1000R ustreza zahtevam FIA T4. Komplet druge stopnje vključuje vtične gorivne celice, samodejni gasilni sistem ter dodaten pregradni del za sedeži.

Ta komplet vključuje:

A true custom fit for your tools that attaches to the FusionFit™ Bed Rail Attachment Kit. Experience effortless installation, solid mounting, and easily adjustable knobs for quick, tool-free alterations while on the move. Includes forks (2), mounting blocks (2), rubber snubbers (2), and all necessary mounting hardware for easy installation

The Tricity is an embodiment of convenience, making commuting simple, easy and fun. With such high dose of practicality, the Urban pack is aimed at increasing the options for Customers to offer additional comfort and space through its various accessories. The high screen provides greater protection against wind, meaning your journeys will never be tiring or uncomfortable. To increase the storage space, we included the rear carrier and the new 34L top case, which also increases the style quotient of the Tricity. There’s no style without substance and  we have thought about the passenger’s comfort as well and hence we include the backrest pad for the top case. We wanted to provide an easy way for our customers to recharge their devices on the go, and hence have included the USB charging port. Available now from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit these high quality Genuine Accessories to your Tricity.
description.sl-SI: Tricity je simbol udobja, zato je vsakodnevna vožnja preprosta in zabavna. Paket 'Urban' je izredno praktičen in z različnimi dodatki uporabniku omogoča boljše udobje med vožnjo in več prostora. Visok vizir poskrbi za boljšo zaščito pred vetrom, kar pomeni, da vaša vožnja nikoli ne bo utrujajoča ali neudobna. Da bi povečali prostor za shranjevanje, smo dodali zadnji nosilec in novi 34-litrski zgornji kovček, ki izboljšata videz vašega skuterja Tricity. Poskrbeli smo, da lahko sopotnik uživa v udobju in se vozi s stilom, zato smo dodali blazino za naslon za zadnji kovček. Strankam smo želeli omogočiti enostaven način polnjenja svojih naprav med vožnjo, zato smo dodali vrata USB za polnjenje. Obrnite se na pooblaščenega prodajalca izdelkov Yamaha, ki bo to visokokakovostno originalno dodatno opremo z veseljem namestil na vaš Tricity.

name.en: Hard Cab Enclosure System Glass Rear Window
name.sl-SI: Stekleno zadnje okno kompleta za zapiranje kabine v trdi izvedbi

description.en: Yamaha is offering all the components of the Hard Cab Enclosure System separately for added customer convenience. Accessing the cargo area with ease is one of the key factors in the fully functional Wolverine X4. This glass rear window opens utilizing familiar gas struts like those of a SUV to hold the glass up while the window is open (window must be closed while in drive).The fully lockable window keeps your items secure from unwanted company. When paired with the Rear Cargo Box that maximizes rear cargo space, you get a truly versatile package ready to conquer the outdoors!
description.sl-SI: Yamaha za lažjo uporabo vse sestavne dele kompleta za zapiranje kabine v trdi izvedbi ponuja ločeno. Ena ključnih značilnosti polnofunkcionalnega modela Wolverine X4 je preprost dostop do prtljažnega prostora. To stekleno zadnje okno se odpre s pomočjo že poznanih plinskih vzmeti, kot so tiste pri športnih terencih, ki zadržijo steklo v zgornjem položaju, ko je okno odprto (med vožnjo mora biti okno zaprto). Ker se da okno v celoti zakleniti, so vaši predmeti varni pred nepridipravi. Če poleg tega uporabljate še zadnji tovorni kovček, ki poveča prtljažni prostor zadaj, je vaš vsestranski paket opreme pripravljen na dogodivščine na prostem!

description.en: Rain and wind shouldn't stop you from activities, and neither should they affect your riding pleasure and comfort. We developed the Apron, which uses special welding technology, to keep you warm and dry, so you can be more comfortable and safe during harsh weather conditions.
description.sl-SI: Dež in veter ne bi smela biti ovira pri aktivnostih, prav tako pa ne bi smela vplivati na vaš užitek in udobje pri vožnji. Razvili smo zaščito za sprednji del telesa, ki uporablja posebno tehnologijo varjenja, ki vas ščiti pred mrazom in dežjem, da vam bo tudi v težjih vremenskih pogojih udobno in boste ostali varni.

description.en: Ténéré 700 is built to take you off the beaten track and move you over to new horizons. The Explorer Pack contains the complete ensemble of accessories to support this journey of discovery. The aluminium side cases with 72L capacity ensure you have enough space to pack up and go at a moment's notice. To carry even extra luggage, the Explorer Pack features an easily mountable mono seat rack, with flat surface, that allows faster setting up of additional bags. With all that luggage, it's imperative to have good bike stability when parked and that's why the Explorer Pack is equipped with a center stand. For added protection, the pack also features a skid plate and an engine guard, so your Ténéré 700 can withstand those long-distance travels. Are you ready to make the next horizon yours?
description.sl-SI: Ténéré 700 je ustvarjen za to, da vas odpelje z običajnih cest in vam odpre nova obzorja. Paket Explorer vsebuje vso dodatno opremo, ki jo potrebujete za takšne raziskovalne izlete v neznano. Aluminijasta kovčka s prostornino 72 litrov vam zagotavljata dovolj prostora za prtljago, zato se lahko na pot odpravite brez posebnih priprav. Paket Explorer vsebuje še prtljažnik za dodatno prtljago za enojni sedež, ki ga lahko preprosto namestite, na njegovo ravno površino pa lahko hitro pritrdite dodatne torbe. Vsa ta količina prtljage zahteva stabilno parkiranje, zato je paket Explorer opremljen tudi s sredinskim stojalom. Za dodatno zaščito paket vključuje še drsno ploščo in ščitnik motorja, da vaš Ténéré 700 prenese tudi najdaljša potovanja. Ste pripravljeni, da osvojite naslednje obzorje?

Nepogrešljiv paket za vsakodnevne voznike, ki potrebujejo dodaten prostor za shranjevanje in funkcionalnost.
description.en: Own every ride with the NMAX Urban Pack 39L, consisting of the High Screen NMAX, Rear Carrier NMAX, 39L Top Case  with Key Cylinder Set  and Top Case Plate, and Top Case Backrest. An essential pack for the regular commuter that needs extra storage and function.

description.sl-SI: Ta eleganten pokrovček nadomešča serijskega za bolj prilagojen videz pri posameznikih, ki opazijo tudi največje podrobnosti na saneh.

description.en: The Factory Yamaha Speed Management Key allows top speed limits to be set to cater for special requirements on job sites or individual operating conditions without affecting acceleration or pulling power. The key can be removed in either restricted or unrestricted mode to allow for owner-controlled operation.
description.sl-SI: : Tovarniški ključ Yamaha za nastavljanje hitrosti omogoča nastavitev najvišje hitrosti, ki ustreza posebnim zahtevam na lokaciji ali individualnim delovnim razmeram brez vpliva na pospešek in moč. Ključ lahko odstranite v omejenem ali neomejenem načinu, ki omogoča upravljanje voznika.

description.en: Enhance your experience on the Yamaha FX Series WaveRunners! This kit allows you to keep your beverage in reach while cruising with your loved ones. You can either complement your existing holder, by replacing the speaker/GPS mounting base, or upgrade your machine with a set.
description.sl-SI: Izboljšajte svojo izkušnjo na Yamahinih WaveRunnerjih serije FX! Ta komplet vam omogoča, da imate pijačo na dosegu roke, medtem ko se peljete s svojimi najdražjimi. Obstoječi nosilec lahko dopolnite tako, da zamenjate pritrditveni nosilec za zvočnik/GPS, ali pa skuter nadgradite s kompletom.

description.en: Outlet suitable to charge your electronic equipment such as mobile phones.
description.sl-SI: Vtičnica omogoča polnjenje elektronske opreme, kot je mobilni telefon.

description.en: The city is the XMAX's natural habitat and with the Urban Accessories Pack you can take the practicality of your XMAX a notch higher. Besides providing enhanced wind protection from the high screen, the pack also takes care of your luggage needs with a 34L top case with matching colour plate set and carrier – keeping your belonging safe and secure. And a backrest for the top case makes sure the passenger has an equally comfortable ride. To protect you from the scratches and the scruffs, the city throws up, the pack contains the XMAX scratch protector. Available from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit these high quality Genuine Accessories to your XMAX.
description.sl-SI: Mesto je XMAX-ovo naravno okolje, s kompletom dodatne opreme Urban pa lahko še bolje izkoristite XMAX-ovo praktičnost. Poleg izboljšane zaščite pred vetrom z visokim vizirjem paket poskrbi tudi za vaše potovalne potrebe s 34-litrskim zgornjim kovčkom z ujemajočim se kompletom barvnih ploščic in nosilcem, ki ščiti vaše osebne predmete. Naslon za zgornji kovček pa poskrbi, da bo tudi sopotnik užival v enako udobni vožnji. Za zaščito pred praskami in odrgninami komplet vključuje zaščito pred praskami XMAX. Obrnite se na pooblaščenega prodajalca izdelkov Yamaha, ki bo to visokokakovostno originalno dodatno opremo z veseljem namestil na vaše vozilo XMAX.

description.en: The Universal Phone Clamp is designed to fit your smartphone with or without standard phone cases. Engineered with high-quality materials, the Universal Phone Clamp will ensure a tight and secure grip on your device while you focus on the road.
description.sl-SI: Univerzalna objemka za telefon je zasnovana za pametni telefon s standardnim ovitkom ali brez njega. Univerzalna objemka za telefon je izdelana iz visokokakovostnih materialov ter zagotavlja tesen in varen oprijem vaše naprave, medtem ko se osredotočate na cesto.

Za takrat, ko morate stvari hitro shraniti in jih imeti pri roki, smo razvili torbo Console. Postavljena je med sedežem in ščitom za noge, je priročna, preprosta za uporabo in točno tam, kjer jo potrebujete.
description.en: For times when you need to store and retrieve things quickly, we developed the Console bag. Placed between the seat and the leg shield, it is convenient, easy and there when you need it.
Shields to mount on either side of the unit - protects both unit and rider
Designed specifically for the Stryke Skis, these handles allow you to match or contrast the colour of your snowmobile.
description.sl-SI: Ponuja popolno ravnovesje med lahkotnim krmiljenjem in natančnim usmerjanjem v različnih snežnih razmerah.

Vrhunski potovalni paket za vaš TRACER 9 za udobno in elegantno raziskovanje odprte ceste. Visok vizir in udoben sedež prinašata največje možno udobje na daljših potovanjih. 45-litrski zgornji kovček in stranski torbi so idealna rešitev za shranjevanje vseh vaših potrebščin. S polnilnikom USB in vtičnico na nosilcu enostavno poskrbite, da so vaše naprave napolnjene in dostopne. Vse varno pritrdite z nosilno ploščo za zgornji kovček ter kompleti spodnjih in zgornjih nosilcev, poleg tega pa lahko uporabite še komplet ključev za cilindrično ključavnico za hiter dostop do potrebščin.
description.en: The ultimate Travel Pack for your TRACER 9 to explore the open road in comfort and style. The High Screen and Comfort Seat deliver maximum comfort on those extended journeys. With the 45L Top Case and Side Cases, you have the ideal storage solutions to carry all your gear. The USB Charger and Holder Socket make it easy to keep your devices powered and accessible. Mount everything securely with the Top Case Mounting Plate, Lower and Upper Stay Kits, and enjoy the convenience of the Key Cylinder Set for quick access to your belongings.

name.en: Outboard Engine Vented Splash Cover (F150, F175 and F200)
name.sl-SI: Zaščitna prevleka za izvenkrmne motorje s prezračevanjem

description.en: Designed to be fitted while using your engine, this cover provides the ultimate protection against scratches and UV rays. The tight fit allows on and off water usage. Perfect on the waves, perfect on the trailer.
description.sl-SI: Ta prevleka je zasnovana za namestitev med uporabo vašega skuterja in zagotavlja neprekosljivo zaščito pred praskami in UV-žarki. Tesno prileganj prevleke omogoča nameščanje na vodi ali na kopnem. Odlična na valovih, odlična na prikolici.

name.en: Ohlins FF spring kit 9,5N/mm for NIX 30
name.sl-SI: Komplet vzmeti za sprednje vilice Öhlins z 9,5 N/mm za NIX 30

description.en: Öhlins fork springs are developed specifically for Öhlins cartridge kits and front forks. But they are also in itself a great front end upgrade and as such available as a spring upgrade for most major bike models.
description.sl-SI: Vzmeti za vilice Öhlins so zasnovane posebej za mehanizem Öhlins in sprednje vilice. Poleg tega poskrbijo tudi za odlično nadgraditev sprednjega dela in so zato na voljo kot nadgradnja vzmeti za večino modelov motorjev.

description.en:
The powerful CP4 engine and lightweight chassis that deliver the ultimate balance between power, agility and stability make the MT-10 the perfect bike for a weekend away filled with adrenaline and torque.
So we have created the Weekend Pack to make sure you enjoy every moment whether you're on or off the bike. 
Gear up for a revving weekend trip!
description.sl-SI:
Zmogljiv motor CP4 in lahka šasija zagotavljata popolno ravnovesje med močjo, okretnostjo in stabilnostjo, zato je MT-10 popoln motor za vikend, poln adrenalina in navora.
V ta namen smo ustvarili dodatno opremo 'Weekend Pack', da boste uživali v vsakem trenutku, ko ste na motorju ali pa tudi ne. 
Pripravite se na vikend izlet "pri višjih obratih"!

description.en: Increases the durability of clutch components
description.sl-SI: Izboljša trpežnost sestavnih delov sklopke

description.en:
Yamaha motorcycles are meant to be used all year long and that is why it is important to have accessories that make every day usage a breeze. 
The Urban Pack contains a rear carrier along with a 39L top case, to keep your valuables securely and with ease. While the motorcycle charges you up with energy, the USB outlet is there to charge your electronic devices.
And finally, there is a higher sport screen to protect you from the urban elements the city throws at you!
description.sl-SI:
Yamahina motorna kolesa so namenjena uporabi skozi vse leto, zato je pomembno, da imate dodatno opremo, ki omogoča enostavno vsakodnevno uporabo. 
Paket Urban Pack vključuje zadnji nosilec in 39-litrski kovček, v katerem lahko varno in enostavno shranjujete dragocene predmete. Motocikel z energijo napolni vas, USB-vtičnica pa vaše elektronske naprave. 
Tu je še višji športni vizir, ki vas ščiti pred elementi urbanega okolja!

The Yamaha Trailering Tilt Motor Support has been designed to allow highway transport of your boat with the motor in a tilted position. The trailering support prevents the motor from returning to the vertical position and possible contact with the road surface.

name.sl-SI: Stranske blazinice za oprijem za rezervoar HDR za model MT-09

description.en: Made from durable rubber material and specifically designed for the MT-09, these tank side pads ensure you have excellent knee grip for total control.

description.en: Use the SP Connect™ Brake Mount to mount your SP Connect™ Phone Case or Universal Interface to your motorcycle in seconds. You can easily attach the Brake Mount to your maxi scooter by screwing it onto the lid of the brake fluid reservoir. This is also a great mounting solution for other motorcycles with limited access to the handlebars. Due to the multiple adjustment possibilities, your mobile phone is securely positioned in your field of vision, allowing you to navigate, access your playlists or use other apps without taking your eyes off the road.
description.sl-SI: Z zavornim nosilcem SP Connect™ na motorno kolo v nekaj sekundah namestite svoje ohišje za mobilni telefon SP Connect™ ali univerzalni vmesnik. Zavorni nosilec lahko preprosto pritrdite na svoj maksi skuter tako, da ga privijete na pokrov rezervoarja zavorne tekočine. To je tudi odlična rešitev za montažo pri drugih motornih kolesih z omejenim dostopom do krmila. Zaradi več možnosti prilagajanja je vaš mobilni telefon varno nameščen v vidnem polju, kar vam omogoča navigacijo, dostop do seznamov predvajanja ali uporabo drugih aplikacij, ne da bi pri tem pogled umaknili s ceste.
Zaščita motorja v obliki jeklene cevi, ki prepreči nastanek škode v primeru udarca. Za dodatno zaščito vključeni najlonski drsniki.

description.en: Made out of heavy duty plastic, these bags are designed to hold shape and stand up on their own. After a day of boating, cleanse your engine with fresh water. Just fill the bag until the water passes the intake inlets and idle your engine in neutral for 5 to 10 minutes. Finally, unscrew the drain plug and let the water flow out.
description.sl-SI: Vrečke so izdelane iz trpežne plastike in so zasnovani tako, da ne spremenijo obliko in lahko samostojno stojijo. Po dnevu na vodi očistite motor s sladko vodo. Napolnite vrečko, dokler voda ne pride do sesalnega priključka, in motor pustite v prostem teku od 5 do 10 minut. Nato odvijte odtočni čep in pustite, da voda izteče.

description.en: The city is the XMAX's natural habitat and with the Urban Accessories Pack you can take the practicality of your XMAX a notch higher. Besides providing enhanced wind protection from the high screen, the pack also takes care of your luggage needs with a 39L top case and carrier – keeping your belonging safe and secure. And a backrest for the top case makes sure the passenger has an equally comfortable ride. To protect you from the scratches and the scruffs, the city throws up, the pack contains the XMAX scratch protector. Urban Pack Content: High Screen | Rear Carrier | 39L Top Case (incl. Lock Key Set) | Backrest for 39L Top Case | Scratch protector
description.sl-SI: Mesto je XMAX-ovo naravno okolje, s kompletom dodatne opreme Urban pa lahko še bolje izkoristite XMAX-ovo praktičnost. Poleg izboljšane zaščite pred vetrom z visokim vizirjem poskrbi tudi za vaše potovalne potrebe z 39-litrskim kovčkom, v katerem bodo vaše stvari varne in zaščitene. Naslon za kovček pa poskrbi, da bo tudi sopotnik užival v enako udobni vožnji. Za zaščito pred praskami in odrgninami komplet vključuje zaščito pred praskami XMAX. Vsebina kompleta Urban Pack: Visok vizir | Zadnji prtljažnik | 39-l kovček (s ključavnico s ključem) | Naslon za 39-l kovček | Zaščita pred praskami

description.sl-SI: Odklenite celoten dirkalni potencial svojega XSR900 s paketom 'Racer'. Mini komplet oblog, mono sedežna prevleka in nosilec registrske tablice dajejo vašemu motornemu kolesu pravi dirkalni videz, medtem ko kolenske blazine nudijo dodaten oprijem. Sekvenčni smerniki pa dodajo sodoben pridih. Paket 'Racer' je kot nalašč za tiste, ki želijo svoji vožnji dodati dirkaški pridih.
description.en: Unleash the full racing potential of your XSR900 with the Racer Pack. The mini fairing kit, mono seat cover and license plate holder give your motorcycle a true race-inspired look, while the knee pads offer extra grip. Finally the sequential blinkers add a modern touch. The Racer Pack is perfect for those who want to add a racing edge to their ride.
Suspension link kit allowing 18mm seat height reduction.

Gumb za sprostitev zraka in priključek Pressure-Rite omogočata preprosto nastavitev ustreznega tlaka in odpravljata izgubo zraka pri odklopu, gibljiva cev pa razbremeni steblo ventila pri črpanju.

description.en: Keep your ski ropes safe and your WaveRunner or boat engine protected with the Yamaha Rope Float. This ingenious accessory helps prevent ropes from getting tangled in the propeller or ingested by the jet pump. Simply thread the rope through the centre of the closed-cell foam tube before attaching it to the tow eye. The durable nylon cover protects the float and boasts a stylish Yamaha logo silk-screened on one side.
Modern LED tail light which gives your unit a nice touch of modern flavour in combination with an authentic look.
description.sl-SI: Sodobna zadnja LED-luč, ki daje sodoben pridih enoti s pristnim videzom.

description.en: This rugged tubular Front Brush Guard is designed to provide additional protection while you venture on and off the trail. It is designed to seamlessly integrate with the front profile of the UMX while adding tough, aggressive styling. Helps protect the grill, hood and cowl while complementing the bold styling of your Yamaha. Perfectly complements tubular rear brush guard (sold separately). The kit includes front brush guard, mounting hardware, and detailed installation instructions.

name.en: Öhlins Front Fork Spring 9,5N/mm for NIX30 Kit
name.sl-SI: Vzmeti za sprednje vilice Öhlins z 9,5 N/mm za komplet NIX30

description.en: Öhlins front fork springs are developed specifically for Öhlins cartridge NIX30 kits and front forks. But they are also in itself a great front end upgrade and option to improve responsiveness and performance of the fork. Öhlins offers a wide range of linear springs to suit each individual type of bike, rider weight and personal preferences for installation into the standard front fork.
description.sl-SI: Vzmeti za sprednje vilice Öhlins so zasnovane posebej za komplet vložkov Öhlins NIX30 in sprednje vilice. Poleg tega poskrbijo tudi za odlično nadgradnjo sprednjega dela ter možnost za izboljšanje odzivnosti in zmogljivosti vilice. Öhlins zagotavlja širok nabor linearnih vzmeti, ki so primerne za vsako posamezno vrsto motornega kolesa, težo voznika in osebne želje za namestitev v standardne sprednje vilice.
Komplet stranskih zaščit iz gume z visoko gostoto za XSR900, ki vam zagotavlja boljši oprijem na motornem kolesu, ko vozite po vijugastih cestah.
description.en: High density rubber Side Pad Set for XSR900, providing you with that extra grip on your bike when handling through the twisty roads.
Engineered to sit on the back, rather than on the neck, and with an added pad, this vest provides increased comfort. Made of high-quality materials it ensures your safety while you enjoy boating.
description.sl-SI: Ta jopič, ki je zasnovan za opiranje na hrbet namesto na vrat in z dodano podlogo, zagotavlja povečano udobje. Narejen je iz visokokakovostnih materialov in zagotavlja vašo varnost, medtem ko uživate v vožnji s čolnom.

name.sl-SI: Ograda za namestitev čez streho za Drive2

description.sl-SI: Zasnovano ekskluzivno za modele Drive2. Natančno izdelano za prilagojeno namestitev na vsako zaščito pred soncem. Elegantna oblika za namestitev čez streho ne pušča sledi in omogoča hitro in preprosto nameščanje ter enostavno prestavljanje z enega vozila na drugega. Sprijemalni pasovi omogočajo dobro pritrditev. Med prozornimi vinilnimi in stranskimi ploščami so varilni zvari.
description.en: Designed exclusively for Drive2 models. Precision engineered for a custom fit for each sun top. Features an over-the-top, trackless style design with quick and easy installation and can be moved from unit to unit without any hassle. Securely fastens with hook-and-loop straps. Feature sheet-welded seams between the clear vinyl and side panels.

name.en: Weather Cover for Yamaha Phone Cases

description.sl-SI: Zaščitite pametni telefon pred dežjem, znojem, prahom ali blatom z uporabo ZAŠČITE PRED VREMENOM skupaj z ovitkom za telefon Yamaha. Poveča odpornost na udarce, zaslon na dotik pa ostane povsem uporaben. Opomba: Debele zaščite za zaslon ali rokavice lahko v kombinaciji z zaščito pred vremenom omejijo uporabnost zaslona na dotik. Zaščita pred vremenom lahko dodatno vpliva na delovanje domačega gumba na mobilnih telefonih iPhone 8, 8 Plus, 7 in 7 Plus. Težavo lahko rešite z vklopom programskega domačega gumba (Assistive Touch).
description.en: Protect your smartphone from rain, sweat, dust or mud by using the WEATHER COVER together with the YAMAHA Phone Case. It adds shock resistance and the touch screen remains fully functional.Note: Thick screen protectors or gloves can limit the usability of your touchscreen in combination with the Weather Cover. The Weather Cover can further affect the homebutton functionality of iPhone 8, 8 Plus, 7 & 7 Plus. This can be compensated by enabling the software homebutton (Assistive Touch).

description.en: A supreme quality oil developed specifically to face the unique demands of the modern stern drive unit. Equally efficient in both petrol and diesel-powered inboard engines, this special formulation has been developed, rigorously tested and approved by Yamaha Motor engineers.
description.sl-SI: Olje najnaprednejše kakovosti, posebej razvito za edinstvene zahteve sodobne enote s krmnim pogonom. To posebno formulo, ki je enako učinkovita pri bencinskih in dizelskih notranjih motorjih, so razvili, striktno testirali in odobrili inženirji družbe Yamaha Motor.

description.en: Keep your investment looking its best, and protect it from the elements.  This cover provides the ultimate protection against fading and the elements. It comes with the Vacu-Hold strapless tow system, eliminating billowing and buffeting. Therefore, the cover conforms to the shape of your WaveRunner. Moreover, the EZ Release Dual 304 Stainless Steel Ratchet Tightening System is pre-tensioned and ready to ratchet upon an easy installation.
description.sl-SI: Ohranite svojo naložbo v najboljšem stanju in jo zaščitit pred vremenskimi vplivi.  Ta prevleka zagotavlja neprekosljivo zaščito pred bledenjem in posledicami vremenskih dejavnikov. Ima sistem Vacu-Hold za pripenjanje brez trakov, ki odpravlja napihovanje in plapolanje prevleke. Zato se popolnoma prilega obliki vašega WaveRunnerja. Poleg tega je zaskočni zatezni sistem Dual 304 iz nerjavnega jekla z enostavnim sproščanjem vnaprej pripravljen, da ga lahko po enostavni namestitvi takoj uporabite.

description.en: Introducing Yamaha's Front Sequential LED Blinker Set – A brilliant symphony of safety and style. Illuminate your journey with precision-engineered LEDs that deliver a captivating sequential light display, enhancing both visibility and aesthetic appeal. Crafted to seamlessly integrate with your Yamaha, this blinker set not only signals your turns but also makes a bold statement on the road. Elevate your riding experience with the perfect blend of innovation and design – Yamaha's Front Sequential LED Blinker Set.
description.sl-SI: Predstavljamo Yamahin komplet sprednjih zaporednih LED smernikov - sijajna simfonija varnosti in sloga. Osvetlite svoje potovanje z natančno izdelanimi diodami LED, ki zagotavljajo očarljiv zaporedni svetlobni prikaz, s čimer izboljšujejo vidljivost in estetski videz. Ta komplet smernikov, ki je zasnovan tako, da se brezhibno ujema z vašo Yamaho, ne signalizira le vaših zavojev, temveč daje tudi drzno izjavo na cesti. Izboljšajte svojo izkušnjo vožnje s popolno kombinacijo inovacij in oblikovanja - Yamahinim kompletom sprednjih sekvenčnih LED smernikov.

Dodajte slog in zaščito svoji Yamahi R9 z zaščitno blazinico visoke gostote za rezervoar. Ta originalna komponenta, izdelana iz trdne in trpežne gumijaste zmesi, ima 3D obliko, zaključeno z logotipom R9, ki izboljša slog vašega motornega kolesa, hkrati pa je opremljena z lepilom 3M VHB, da ostane trdno pritrjena na vaš rezervoar za gorivo.
description.en: Add style and protection to your Yamaha R9 with the High Density Rubber Tank Pad. Engineered from a tough and durable rubber compound, this genuine component features a 3D design finished with an R9 logo to enhance the style of your motorcycle, while being supported by 3M VHB adhesive to remain secure to your fuel tank.

The Style Pack gives your R7 an even sharper profile on the street and multiplies this compact Supersport’s high thrill factor! This Genuine Accessories pack comes with a quick shifter that enables clutchless gear shifting for even faster and smoother acceleration. The dark-smoked sport screen and lightweight license plate holder give a more dynamic look to your R7 – while the tank side grip pads provide you with extra controllability. And the racing-style billet front brake lever guard shows its pure race-bred DNA.  Available now from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit the high quality Genuine Accessories in this R7 Style Pack to your motorcycle
description.sl-SI: Paket Style daje vašemu R7 še lepši profil na cesti in pomnoži faktor navdušenja tega kompaktnega motocikla razreda Supersport. Ta paket originalnih dodatkov vsebuje sistem hitrega prestavljanja, ki omogoča prestavljanje brez sklopke za še hitrejše in enakomernejše pospeševanje. Zatemnjen športni vizir in lahek nosilec registrske tablice dajeta vašemu R7 še bolj dinamičen videz – stranske obloge rezervoarja za gorivo pa omogočajo boljši nadzor nad motociklom. Ščitnik ročice sprednje zavore v dirkaškem slogu pa kaže na čistokrvni dirkaški DNK.  Obrnite se na pooblaščenega prodajalca izdelkov Yamaha, ki bo to visokokakovostno originalno dodatno opremo v paketu Style za R7 z veseljem namestil na vaše motorno kolo.

description.en: Quick-shift system, increasing bike control and making gear change easier.

With its off-road credentials, the Ténéré 700 is meant to be ridden dirty! To give you and your motorcycle that edge of the seat adrenaline rush, the Rally Pack offers some of the most exciting and sporty Yamaha Genuine Accessories. Giving you the freedom to change riding position dynamically, the rally seat increases the authentic rally look of your Ténéré 700. To make it also sound like a true rally machine, the Akrapovič slip-on gives a throaty-rich exhaust note. Taking your bike off road can push the drive-train to its edges, and this is why the chain guide, chain guard and radiator protector are there to safeguard important elements of your Ténéré 700. For a sharp and dynamic look, the Rally Pack also includes number plate holder, tank pad and LED blinkers. The Rally Pack is your ticket to the ultimate sideways drifting action!
description.sl-SI: S svojim terenskim značajem je Ténéré 700 ustvarjen za agresivno vožnjo! Paket Rally vsebuje izbor najbolj vznemirljive in športne Yamahine originalne dodatne opreme, da vam bo na polno poganjal adrenalin po žilah. Rally sedež, ki vam omogoča spreminjanje položaja med vožnjo, še dodatno poudarja pristen rally videz vašega motorja Ténéré 700. Da pa bo tudi zvenel kot pravi rally motor, Akrapovičev dušilnik skrbi za grlene tone izpuha. Vožnja po brezpotjih lahko pomeni preizkušnjo samih meja pogonskega sistema, zato vodilo verige, ščitnik verige in ščitnik hladilnika varujejo pomembne dele vašega motorja Ténéré 700. Za drzen in dinamičen videz paket Rally vključuje nosilec registrske tablice, zaščito za rezervoar in LED-smernike. Paket Rally je vaša vstopnica v svet brezkompromisne akcije z bočnim zdrsavanjem!

description.en: Stylish adjustment on your XSR700 / XTribute. Designed for those riders that demand maximum performance from their motorcycle. This exhaust system combines increased engine performance with an exciting sound output.

The YA589 rear shock absorber for R7 is a monotube shock with a hose mounted gas reservoir. The adjustable compression and rebound damping enables you to really change the characteristics of the bike. And with its hydraulic spring preload adjuster you can change the stance of your bike to accommodate for extra weight!
description.sl-SI: Zadnji blažilnik YA589 za R7 je enocevni blažilnik s plinskim rezervoarjem, nameščenim s cevjo. Nastavljiva kompresija in povratno blaženje vam omogočata, da popolnoma spremenite lastnosti motornega kolesa. Z mehanizmom za nastavitev trdote hidravličnega vzmetenja pa lahko spreminjate tudi držo in razporeditev teže na motornem kolesu glede na dodatno težo.

description.en: Protect the cargo bed floor of your UMX with our super tough and durable cargo bed mat. Made from proprietary 10mm thick, reinforced, Nyracord-like engineered rubber. Bold styling matches the unit look and aggressive lug pattern helps prevent cargo from sliding in the bed area.
Additional extension to the standard rear rack to keep your belongings secured and it adds functional space to the standard rack.

description.en: The quick shifter increases bike control and makes gear change easier. Derived from Yamaha Racing technology, the system allows for effortless shifting.
description.sl-SI: Sistem za hitro menjavo prestav izboljša nadzor nad motornim kolesom ter olajša prestavljanje. Sistem izhaja iz tehnologije Yamaha Racing ter omogoča enostavno prestavljanje.

name.sl-SI: Yamalube® – popolnoma sintetično olje 15W-50 za štiritaktnike

description.en: The high performance solution for demanding riders. Separate gearbox? Integrated gearbox? Wet clutch? This unique formulation is the ideal answer.It’s perfect for sports, road and off-road bikes, trail machines, scooters, ATVs, and quads. It has all the same protection of the Fully synthetic Oil 10W-40 but is also extra-capable at ultra-high revs and temperatures.
description.sl-SI: Visokozmogljiva rešitev za zahtevne voznike motornih koles. Ločeni menjalnik? Vgrajeni menjalnik? Mokra sklopka? Ta edinstvena formula je popoln odgovor. Primerna je za športna, cestna in terenska motorna kolesa, vozila za teren, skuterje, ATV-je in štirikolesnike. Nudi enako zaščito kot popolnoma sintetično olje 10W-40, a je tudi izredno zmogljivo pri zelo visokih vrtljajih in temperaturah.

description.en: Allows the usage of a standard ball mount to tow a small trailer.
description.sl-SI: Omogoča uporabo standardnega krogličnega nastavka za vleko manjših prikolic.

description.en: Combination of GYTR parts for Engine maintenance of your R6 GYTR/Race

description.en: Enhance the style of your MT-03 with the minimalist and sporty licence plate holder. Lightweight and easy to assemble, with exclusive MT branding and LED lighting.
Boat cover light grey
description.sl-SI: Prevleka za čoln, svetlo siva

description.en:
There is a reason why there is a word sport in “Sport Touring” - while you can comfortably munch miles on the Tracer 900, you can equally set corners alight with the nimble and agile handling. 
To explore this sporty side of the Tracer 900, we put together the Sport Pack. 
It does so in two ways, a) Looks b) Functionality.  
Step up to the sport dimension!
description.sl-SI:
S športno-potovalnim motornim kolesom Tracer 900 se lahko odpravite na daljšo vožnjo ali pa s spretnim upravljanjem polagate ovinke, saj je ta model zelo okreten. 
Za raziskovanje športne plati modela Tracer 900 smo oblikovali komplet Sport Pack. 
Pri tem je poskrbljeno za videz in funkcionalnost. 
Privoščite si športno vožnjo.

name.en: CAPIT Tire Warmer Suprema Spina M/XL
name.sl-SI: Grelnik pnevmatik Suprema Spina M/XL CAPIT

description.en: Tire warmers allow you to get full performance from your machine right from the starting line, and without having to do several laps to warm up your tires.
description.sl-SI: Grelniki pnevmatik omogočajo popolne zmogljivosti vašega motorja takoj od začetka, brez potrebe po dodatnih vožnjah za ogrevanje pnevmatik.

description.en: High quality antique bronzed finished yet functional spools to mount into the swingarm of your Yamaha.
description.sl-SI: Funkcionalne tuljave z izredno kakovostno površinsko obdelavo v antični bronasti barvi za namestitev na nihajno roko vaše Yamahe.

description.en: The new TRACER 9 Sport Pack provides the right sporty finish for your TRACER 9. The Sport Pack gives your bike that bit extra to personalize your motorcycle to your ideal image. Slide through your gears with the Quick Shifter while the Knee Pads provide the extra grip for your knees when shredding corners. The sleek License Plate Holder sharpens up the rear and the stylishly designed Side Sliders protect your engine from any unfortunate moments.
description.sl-SI: Novi paket Sport za TRACER 9 zagotavlja pravo športno obdelavo vašega TRACER 9. Paket Sport daje motociklu tisto nekaj več, s čimer lahko prilagodite svoj motocikel po svoji želji. Hitro prestavljanje Quick Shifter vam omogoča hitro menjavo prestav, kolenske blazinice pa dajejo dodatni oprijem kolenom med nagibanjem v ovinkih. Z elegantnim nosilcem registrske tablice je zadek videti lepše, moderno zasnovani stranski ščitniki pa ščitijo motor pred neželenimi trenutki.

description.en: Provides optimal shade while also adding protection from low hanging trees and brush along the trails. Designed to work perfectly with the Hard Cab Enclosure System, and Soft Cab Enclosure System.
description.sl-SI: Zagotavlja optimalno senco in tudi zaščito pred nizkimi vejami na poti. Nemotena uporaba s kompletom za zapiranje kabine v trdi in mehki izvedbi.

description.en: Provides protection from wind and trail debris.

description.en: The true heritage-styled Racer Pack provides that ultimate finishing touch to your XSR125. Designed in the spirit of the Café Racer,  the Racer Pack contains a Racer Cowl & Stays, Side Tank Pads, aluminium Side Covers and the extra stylish License Plate Holder 2.0.
description.sl-SI: Paket Racer Pack, ki je oblikovan v značilnem slogu, in črpa navdih iz dediščine, nudi vrhunske dodelave vašega XSR125. Paket Racer Pack, ki je zasnovan na podlagi Caferacerja, vsebuje dirkaške pokrove in naslone za noge, stranske obloge rezervoarja za gorivo, aluminijaste stranske zaščitne ploščice in zelo moderen nosilec registrske tablice 2.0.
