description.en: Upgrade your Side-by-Side with the Soft Cabin Pack for the Wolverine® X4 850. Pack includes: Fixed Poly Windshield, Soft Cover Rear Window and Soft Side Covers.
description.sl-SI: Nadgradite svoj model Side-by-Side s paketom za mehko kabino za model Wolverine® X4 850. Paket vključuje: fiksno polikarbonatno vetrobransko steklo, mehko prevleko za zadnje okno in mehke stranske pokrove.

Športni paket povzdigne vašo Yamaho XMAX na naslednjo raven sloga skuterja. Športni paket XMAX vsebuje športni vizir XMAX, nosilec registrske tablice in njegov pokrov, sprednje in zadnje zavorne ročice, izdelane izključno za Yamaha XMAX.
description.en: The Sport Pack takes your Yamaha XMAX to the next level of scooter style. The XMAX Sport Pack comprises the XMAX Sport Screen, License Plate Holder and its cover, front and rear brake levers and end grips, all made exclusively for the Yamaha XMAX.

The XMAX is personification of what a sporty scooter should be. However we always trying to push the boundary and with the Sport pack for the XMAX, we aim to take it to an even higher level. Intensify the sporty spirit of your XMAX with the Sports pack. The sports pack contains sports screen, license plate holder, aluminium end grip and aluminium foot panel – the perfect combination of sports style and flair.  And the Sports Pack is just the beginning: truly personalize your XMAX by adding other accessories from the vast selection of XMAX Genuine accessories as well.
description.sl-SI: XMAX je točno tak, kot bi moral biti športni skuter. Vendar pa vedno poskušamo premikati meje in s kompletom Sport za XMAX ga želimo popeljati na še višjo raven. Še intenzivnejši športni duh XMAX-a s kompletom Sport. Komplet Sport vključuje športni vizir, nosilec registrske tablice, aluminijaste ročaje in aluminijaste plošče stopalk – popolna kombinacija športnega sloga in elegance.  Komplet Sport je šele začetek: izbirate lahko med širokim naborom originalne dodatne opreme XMAX in popolnoma personalizirate svoj XMAX.

description.en: Custom handlebar ends enhance the design of the MT-07.

description.sl-SI: Zaščita za rezervoar goriva.
description.en: Protection pad for the fuel tank.

name.sl-SI: Komplet za popravilo GYTR R1 (2020 in novejše različice)
name.en: GYTR Repair Set R1 (2020 and Up)

description.en: This set contains Meter, Switch Handles, Rotor Sensor and Front Wheel Sensor Assembly.

description.sl-SI: Nadgradite svoj TRACER 7 s športnim paketom za dinamično izkušnjo vožnje, ki združuje slog in zmogljivosti. Zaporedni smerniki LED dajejo vašemu motornemu kolesu sodoben videz, hkrati pa izboljšajo vidljivost na cesti. Sistem za hitro prestavljanje CP2 zagotavlja gladko in hitro menjavo prestav. Zaščitite motorno kolo s stranskimi zaščitami in dopolnite športno estetiko s poenostavljenim nosilcem registrske tablice. Komplet TRACER 7 'Sport Pack' vključuje vse, kar potrebujete za nadgradnjo vožnje z natančnostjo in slogom.
description.en: Upgrade your TRACER 7 with the Sport Pack for a dynamic riding experience that combines style and performance. The Sequential LED Blinkers give your bike a modern look while enhancing visibility on the road. The Quick Shifter CP2 ensures smooth and fast gear changes. Protect your bike with the Side Pads, and complete the sporty aesthetic with the streamlined License Plate Holder. The TRACER 7 Sport Pack delivers everything you need to elevate your ride with precision and style.
Your ride. Your style. Customize your MT-09 with the diamond-shaped bar-end mirror that enhances the bike's aggressive look. Please note that this item is sold individually, not as a pair.
description.sl-SI: Vaš dvokolesnik. Vaš slog. Prilagodite svoj MT-09 z ogledalom na krmilu v obliki romba in poudarite drzen videz motornega kolesa. Upoštevajte, da se ta izdelek prodaja posamično in ne v paru.

description.en: This Öhlins cartridge kit consisting of 22 mm piston diameter and 8 mm piston shaft replaces the standard one. It allows for stable damping characteristics thanks to positive pressure build up and a more precise adjustment.
description.sl-SI: Komplet vložkov Öhlins z batom premera 22 milimetrov in 8-milimetrsko batnico nadomešča običajnega. Z nastajanjem nadtlaka in natančnejšo nastavitvijo zagotavlja zanesljivo blaženje.

name.sl-SI: Športna torba za na posodo za gorivo

description.en: New-smaller tank bag to allow small luggage carrying while enhancing sporty look - specific for more sportive driving position.
description.sl-SI: Nova manjša torba za na rezervoar omogoča prenos manjše prtljage, obenem pa izboljša športni videz – zlasti za bolj športen položaj med vožnjo.

name.sl-SI: Ploščica s številko XSR na levem delu

description.en: These brushed aluminium side number plates remind you of classic sports bikes and clean up the looks when your carrier bags are not mounted,
description.sl-SI: Ti stranski ploščici s številkami iz brušenega aluminija spominjata na klasične športne motorje in ustvarjata čistejši videz, ko nimate nameščenih nosilcev za torbe.

description.en: Upgrade your Yamaha eBike with our Side Stand Kit, designed for convenience, stability, and easy installation. This kit provides the support you need to park your eBike securely on various surfaces. Make sure to add in your purchase, the Mounting Plate and Main Stand Bolt to install it on the eBike. These components are essential for ensuring your eBike remains stable and upright, no matter where you park.
description.sl-SI:
Nadgradite svoj Yamaha eBike z našim kompletom bočnega stojala, ki je zasnovan za udobje, stabilnost in enostavno namestitev. Ta komplet zagotavlja podporo, ki jo potrebujete za varno parkiranje e-kolesa na različnih površinah.
V vaš nakup vključite montažno ploščo in vijak glavnega stojala, da ga namestite na eBike. Te komponente so ključne za zagotavljanje stabilnosti in pokončnega položaja vašega e-kolesa, ne glede na to, kje parkirate.

name.sl-SI: Komplet vzmeti za sprednje vilice Öhlins z 8,5 N/mm

description.sl-SI: Ta komplet vzmeti za sprednje vilice Öhlins je potreben za namestitev kompleta vložkov NIX 22 Öhlins, odvisno od teže voznika (brez opreme).

description.en:
The natural riding position and excellent fuel range make your MT-09 the perfect bike for weekends away. 
So Yamaha has created the Weekend Pack to make sure that you can enjoy every minute of your time whether you’re on or off the bike.
description.sl-SI:
MT-09 je zaradi naravnega položaja sedenja med vožnjo in odličnega dosega z enim rezervoarjem popoln motocikel za potep ob koncu tedna. 
Zato je Yamaha pripravila paket Weekend Pack, s katerim boste lahko uživali v vsaki minuti, ne glede na to ali jo preživljate na motorju ali ne.

description.en: We, at Yamaha, want to make sure that all our customers have the best experience while riding our products. For those, who find the standard seat on the XMAX a little high, we created the Low seat. It improves access to the ground, so that you can plant your foot comfortably on the road.
description.sl-SI: Pri družbi Yamaha želimo našim strankam zagotoviti optimalno izkušnjo vožnje z našimi modeli. Za vse, ki jim je standardni sedež na modelih XMAX nekoliko visok, smo ustvarili nizek sedež. Izboljša dostop do tal, tako da lahko brez težav stopite na cesto.

Ima sistem Vacu-Hold za vleko s pripenjanjem brez trakov, ki prepreči napihovanje in plapolanje prevleke. Zato se popolnoma prilega obliki vašega vodnega skuterja.

description.en:
The SP Connect™ Bar Clamp Mount Pro lets you mount your smartphone to your motorcycle in seconds. The Bar Clamp Mount Pro also has a swiveling and rotating head so your smartphone can always be positioned perfectly. 
Just screw this sleek aluminium mount to the bar clamp of your motorbike and you are ready to mount the SP Connect™ PHONE CASE (or UNIVERSAL INTERFACE) by placing it on the mount and turning it 90° clockwise. Your mobile phone is securely positioned in your field of vision, allowing you to navigate, access your playlists.
description.sl-SI:
Z nosilcem na krmilu SP Connect™ Pro lahko v nekaj sekundah namestite svoj pametni telefon na motocikel. Nosilec na krmilu Pro ima tudi vrtljivo in rotacijsko glavo, tako da je lahko vaš pametni telefon vedno kar najbolje nameščen. 
Samo privijte ta eleganten aluminijasti nosilec na nosilec krmila motocikla in že ste pripravljeni na namestitev ohišja za mobilni telefon SP Connect™ (ali univerzalnega vmesnika) tako, da ga postavite na nosilec in obrnete v smeri urnega kazalca za 90°. Mobilni telefon je varno nameščen v vidnem polju, kar vam omogoča navigacijo in dostop do seznamov predvajanja.

description.en: The sport screen (medium screen) provides additional wind protection due to seamless integration.

The city is the XMAX's natural habitat and with the Urban Accessories Pack you can take the practicality of your XMAX a notch higher. Besides providing enhanced wind protection from the high screen, the pack also takes care of your luggage needs with a 50L top case and carrier – keeping your belonging safe and secure. And a backrest for the top case makes sure the passenger has an equally comfortable ride. To protect you from the scratches and the scruffs the city throws up, the pack contains the XMAX scratch protector. Urban Pack Content: High Screen | Rear Carrier | 50L Top Case (incl. Lock Key Set) | Backrest for 50L Top Case | Scratch protector

Poleg izboljšane zaščite pred vetrom z visokim vizirjem poskrbi tudi za vaše potovalne potrebe s 50-litrskim kovčkom, v katerem bodo vaše stvari varne in zaščitene. Naslon za kovček pa poskrbi, da bo tudi sopotnik užival v enako udobni vožnji. +Za zaščito pred praskami in odrgninami komplet vključuje zaščito pred praskami XMAX. Vsebina kompleta Urban Pack: Visok vizir | Zadnji prtljažnik | 50-l kovček (s ključavnico s ključem) | Naslon za 50-l kovček | Zaščita pred praskami

Komplet TRACER 9 'Travel Pack Pro' je vrhunski sklop opreme za voznike, ki zahtevajo udobje, priročnost in vsestranskost. Visok vizir in dodaten širok zaščitni vizir zagotavljata odlično zaščito pred vetrom, ogrevan udoben sedež in sopotnikov sedež pa prinašata udobje med dolgimi vožnjami. V opremo so vključeni sistem za nadzor tlaka v pnevmatikah (TPMS) in ogrevane ročke, da lahko vozite samozavestno ne glede na vremenske razmere. Zgornji kovček in stranska kovčka ponujajo dovolj prostora za shranjevanje vseh vaših bistvenih stvari, medtem ko polnilnik USB in vtičnica držala ohranjata vaše naprave pripravljene in dostopne.

Nosilec za GPS omogoča enostavno uporabo navigacije, zaradi ščitnika hladilnika in zaščite agregata 'Explorer' pa je vožnja še bolj brezskrbna. Komplet meglenk LED in nosilec za meglenke zagotavljata optimalno vidljivost v vseh pogojih. Zavarujte vso svojo opremo z nosilno ploščo za zgornji kovček, kompleti nosilcev in kompletom ključev za cilindrično ključavnico za hiter dostop. S paketom TRACER 9 'Travel Pack Pro' je vsaka pustolovščina brezhibna mešanica sloga, udobja in funkcionalnosti.
description.en:
The TRACER 9 Travel Pack Pro is the ultimate setup for riders who demand comfort, convenience, and versatility. The High Screen and Add-On Wide Screen provide excellent wind protection, while the Heated Comfort Seat and Passenger Seat keep both you and your passenger comfortable during long rides. Equipped with a Tire Pressure Monitoring System (TPMS) and Heated Grips, you can ride confidently, no matter the weather. The Top Case and Side Cases offer ample storage for all your essentials, while the USB Charger and Holder Socket keep your devices ready and accessible.

Navigate easily with the GPS Stay, and ride with peace of mind knowing your bike is protected by the Radiator Guard and Explorer Engine Guard. The LED Fog Light Kit and Fog Light Stay ensure optimal visibility in any conditions. Secure all your gear with the Top Case Mounting Plate, Stay Kits, and Key Cylinder Set for quick access. With the TRACER 9 Travel Pack Pro, every adventure is a seamless blend of style, comfort, and function.
Sharpen up your Tricity 300’s dynamic style with this lightweight Licence Plate Holder. This stylish Genuine Accessory is easy to fit and includes all cables for blinkers and the licence plate light.

Nadgradite svoj TRACER 9 GT+ s 'Travel Pack Pro' za neprimerljivo udobje in funkcionalnost. Visok vizir in dodaten širok zaščitni vizir omogočata boljšo zaščito pred vetrom, ogrevan udoben sedež in sedež za sopotnika pa zagotavljata udobno vožnjo. Ostanite obveščeni s sistemom za nadzor tlaka v pnevmatikah (TPMS) in kompletom za nadzor tlaka v pnevmatikah. Zaščitite motorno kolo s ščitnikom hladilnika in zaščito agregata 'Explorer' ter povečajte vidljivost s kompletom meglenk LED. Zavarujte opremo z nosilno ploščo za zgornji kovček, zgornjim kovčkom in naslonom. Ta paket združuje vrhunske funkcije za vrhunsko potovalno izkušnjo.
description.en: Upgrade your TRACER 9 GT+ with the Travel Pack Pro for unmatched comfort and functionality. The High Screen and Add-On Wide Screen enhance wind protection, while the Heated Comfort Seat and Passenger Seat ensure a cozy ride. Stay informed with the TPMS and Tire Pressure Monitoring Kit. Protect your bike with the Radiator Guard, Explorer Engine Guard, and add visibility with the LED Fog Light Kit. Secure your gear with the Top Case Mounting Plate, Top Case, and Backrest. This pack combines premium features for a superior travel experience.

description.sl-SI:
Če pnevmatika ni raztrgana, poškodovana ali sneta s platišča, lahko težavo prazne pnevmatike ali pnevmatike, ki pušča, s tem preparatom preprosto rešite – Yamalube za hitro popravilo pnevmatik.
Pnevmatiko zatesni in napolni, ne da bi pri tem morali odstraniti pnevmatiko ali kolo, zato je ta pripomoček vaš prijatelj za reševanje obcestnih težav.
description.en:
If it is not torn, damaged or off the rim, a flat or leaking tyre is no problem with this handy solution - Yamalube Quick Tyre Repair.
It seals and inflates a tyre without the need to remove the tyre or the wheel, so it’s your roadside friend in need.

The innovative FX RecDeck is a first of its kind platform, that extends the usable space on the stern and pairs with a multi-use rack and related lifestyle accessories for all new experiences on the water. Packages include JetFish and Lounging so whether you want to catch the next big one or chill in style and comfort, this brand new line of accessories powers a new passion for what you can do on the water.
description.sl-SI: RecDeck za FX je inovativna ploščad, kot je še ni bilo. Zagotavlja razširitev uporabnega prostora na krmi ter združljivost z večnamenskim nosilcem in sorodno dodatno opremo za nove, bogate izkušnje na vodi. Ne glede na to, ali želite uloviti svojo največjo ribo ali uživati v slogu in udobju, vam bo ta povsem nova linija dodatne opreme s paketi, kot sta JetFish in Lounging, odprla vrata v nov svet zabave na vodi.

Yamalube® S2 za dvotaktne agregate je kos vsaki nalogi.

description.en: Yamalube® Protective Fogging Oil lubricates and prevents rust to protect internal engine components during winter and extended storage periods. The oil creates superior film retention that protects against against corrosion and dry starts, extending engine life and reducing operating expense.

Yamalube Brake Cleaner is the ideal fluid for cleaning and degreasing brake and clutch components as well as many other parts on your machine. Its special formula rapidly dissolves and removes oil, grease, tar spots, brake fluid and dirt – and being non-corrosive, it won’t harm rubber, plastic or paint.

With its compact dimension, the lightweight and dual leaning front wheels, Tricity represents the best solution for every day commuting. But who said that can’t go hand in hand with a sporty experience? The Sport pack adds a sleek look, while the Tricity loses none of its convenience. The smoke-tinted sport screen comes in a short dynamic shape. This is further enhanced by the backrest base alongside the cushion to ensure passengers are comfortable, while the sportier silhouette heightens the dynamic nature of the scooter.
Available now from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit these high quality Genuine Accessories to your Tricity.

Te lastnosti pa se lepo skladajo tudi s športno vožnjo. Paket Sport poskrbi za eleganten videz, medtem pa Tricity ohrani svoje udobje. Zatemnjen športni vizir je kratke, dinamične oblike. Za udobje potnikov je še dodatno poskrbljeno z nosilcem za naslon poleg blazine, športna oblika pa poveča dinamičnost skuterja.
Obrnite se na pooblaščenega prodajalca izdelkov Yamaha, ki bo to visokokakovostno originalno dodatno opremo z veseljem namestil na vaš Tricity.

description.sl-SI:
TRACER 9 GT 'Travel Pack Pro' je zasnovan za voznike, ki iščejo maksimalno udobje, varnost in funkcionalnost na dolgih razdaljah. Visok vizir v kombinaciji z dodatnim širokim zaščitnim vizirjem omogoča boljšo zaščito pred vetrom, ogrevan udoben sedež in sopotnikov udoben sedež pa vozniku in sopotniku prinašata toploto in sproščenost. Ohranite nadzor s kompletom za nadzor tlaka v pnevmatikah in sistemom za nadzor tlaka v pnevmatikah (TPMS) na krmilu, nosilec za GPS pa omogoča jasen pregled nad navigacijo. Zgornji kovček in naslon zagotavljata veliko prostora za shranjevanje in udobje sopotnika, s polnilnikom USB z vtičnico na nosilcu pa poskrbite, da so vaše naprave vedno napolnjene.

Za dodatno zaščito pred kamenčki na cesti se namestita ščitnik hladilnika in zaščita agregata 'Explorer', komplet meglenk LED z nosilcem za meglenke pa zagotavlja vidljivost v vseh pogojih. Ta paket je popoln spremljevalec za vsako pustolovščino na vašem TRACER 9 GT.
description.en:
The TRACER 9 GT Travel Pack Pro is built for riders seeking maximum comfort, safety, and functionality on long-distance rides. The High Screen, paired with the Add-On Wide Screen, enhances wind protection, while the Heated Comfort Seat and Passenger Comfort Seat ensure warmth and relaxation for both rider and passenger. Stay in control with the Tire Pressure Monitoring Kit and TPMS on the handlebar, while the GPS Stay keeps your navigation in clear view. The Top Case and Backrest provide ample storage and comfort for your passenger, and the USB Charger with Holder Socket ensures your devices remain powered.

For added protection, the Radiator Guard and Explorer Engine Guard shield your bike from road debris, and the LED Fog Light Kit with Fog Light Stay ensures visibility in all conditions. This pack  is the ultimate companion for every adventure on your TRACER 9 GT.

Yamahina motorna kolesa so namenjena uporabi skozi vse leto, zato je pomembno, da imate dodatno opremo, ki omogoča enostavno vsakodnevno uporabo.
Paket Urban Pack vključuje zadnji nosilec in 45-litrski kovček, v katerem lahko varno in enostavno shranjujete dragocene predmete. Motorno kolo z energijo napolni vas, USB-vtičnica pa vaše elektronske naprave. Kratek in eleganten vizir pa vas ščiti pred vetrom in vsem, kar se znajde na vaši poti!
description.en:
Yamaha motorcycles are meant to be used all year long and that is why it is important to have accessories that make every day usage a breeze.
The Urban Pack contains a rear carrier along with a 45 L top case to keep your valuables securely and with ease. While the motorcycle charges you up with energy, the USB outlet is there to charge your electronic devices. And finally, there is a stylish short screen to protect you from wind or whatever the city throws at you!

Zadnji blažilnik Öhlins YA819, ki je izdelan z vrhunskimi komponentami za dirke, je popolnoma prilagodljiv in odlično dopolni vaš Ténéré 700 World Raid.

Visok vizir in udoben sedež prinašata največje možno udobje na daljših potovanjih. 45-litrski zgornji kovček in stranski torbi so idealna rešitev za shranjevanje vseh vaših potrebščin. S polnilnikom USB in vtičnico na nosilcu enostavno poskrbite, da so vaše naprave napolnjene in dostopne. Vse varno pritrdite z nosilno ploščo za zgornji kovček ter kompleti spodnjih in zgornjih nosilcev, poleg tega pa lahko uporabite še komplet ključev za cilindrično ključavnico za hiter dostop do potrebščin.
description.en: The ultimate Travel Pack for your TRACER 9 to explore the open road in comfort and style. The High Screen and Comfort Seat deliver maximum comfort on those extended journeys. With the 45L Top Case and Side Cases, you have the ideal storage solutions to carry all your gear. The USB Charger and Holder Socket make it easy to keep your devices powered and accessible. Mount everything securely with the Top Case Mounting Plate, Lower and Upper Stay Kits, and enjoy the convenience of the Key Cylinder Set for quick access to your belongings.

Verige za časa svoje življenjske dobe delujejo v težkih, nevarnih in zelo stresnih okoliščinah, tudi če so čiste. Zato z vsako izboljšavo na področju tehnologije mazanja podaljšujemo življenjsko dobo verige. Ne pozabite, čista in dobro namazana veriga bolj gladko teče. Ne gre pa samo za zaščito pred obrabo, dandanes veliko pozornosti posvečamo tudi lastnosti maziva, ki poskrbi, da sredstvo ostane na mestu nanosa. V tem pršilu Yamalube je formula, ki ji ni para.
description.en: A chain lives a tough, dangerous and extremely stressful life, even when it’s kept clean! So every improvement we make in lube technology is geared to add more life to it, and remember ,a clean, well-lubricated chain is a smoother-running chain! It’s not all about protection against wear though – these days we place great importance on the ‘throw-off’ behavior of the lubricant and in this Yamalube spray is a formula that’s hard to beat..

description.sl-SI: Zima je čas zabav, praznikov in praznovanj, paket Winter pa zagotavlja, da enak občutek veselja doživite tudi s svojim modelom Tricity. Da bodo vaše roke prijetno tople, ne glede na vremenske pogoje, smo vključili grelnike ročk. V paket je vključen tudi ščitnik za členke, ki tok dohodnega zraka preusmeri stran od rok ter skupaj z grelniki ročk poskrbi za kar najboljšo zaščito pred hladnim vetrom. Zaščita za sprednji del telesa odlično varuje spodnji del telesa pred mrazom, vetrom in dežjem. Obrnite se na pooblaščenega prodajalca izdelkov Yamaha, ki bo to visokokakovostno originalno dodatno opremo z veseljem namestil na vaš Tricity.
description.en: Winter is a time for festivity, holiday and celebration, and the Winter pack ensures that you experience that same feeling of joy with your Tricity. To keep your hands warm and toasty, whatever the condition, we have included the grip heaters. Also included are knuckle visors that channel incoming airflow away from your hands, and combined with the grip heaters, provide optimum protection against wind chill. The Apron does an excellent job of protecting your lower body from the cold, wind and rain. Available now from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit these high quality Genuine Accessories to your Tricity.

name.sl-SI: POLSINTETIČNO OLJE YAMALUBE S2-SM ZA SNEŽNE SANI

description.sl-SI: Olje Yamalube® za dvotaktne snežne sani je bilo izdelano za sodobne, visokotehnološke dvotaktne agregate snežnih sani in je primerno za sisteme za predhodno mešanje ali vbrizgavanje olja. name.sl-SI: Prostor za shranjevanje na krmi za FX

description.en: Compression-molded FX Stern Storage bag adds to the already abundant storage to ensure you can bring everything you need for long trips on the water. Constructed of UV resistant, compression molded materials, (2) side rod-holders, custom styled exterior integrates with unit styling, interior mesh base allows for quick water drainage (Storage is not water proof), access to stern tow point for watersports usage.
description.sl-SI: Tlačno lita torba za shranjevanje na krmi za FX je dodatek že tako velikemu prostoru za shranjevanje, ki vam omogoča, da s seboj vzamete vse potrebno za dolge izlete na vodi. Izdelana je iz tlačno litih materialov, odpornih na UV-žarke, in se ponaša z (2) stranskima nosilcema za palice, zunanjostjo v slogu po meri, skladno z videzom skuterja, notranjo mrežasto podlogo za hitro odtekanje vode (prostor za shranjevanje ni vodoodporen) ter možnostjo dostopa do vlečne točke na krmi za vodne športe.

description.en:
The Tricity is an embodiment of convenience, making commuting simple, easy and fun. With such high dose of practicality, the Urban pack is aimed at increasing the options for Customers to offer additional comfort and space through its various accessories. The high screen provides greater protection against wind, meaning your journeys will never be tiring or uncomfortable. To increase the storage space, we included the rear carrier and the 39L top case. The passenger’s comfort is also of upmost importance and hence we include the backrest pad for the top case. 
Available now from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit these high quality Genuine Accessories to your Tricity.
description.sl-SI:
Tricity je simbol udobja, zato je vsakodnevna vožnja preprosta in zabavna. Paket Urban je izredno praktičen in z različnimi dodatki uporabniku omogoča boljše udobje v vožnji in več prostora. Visok vizir poskrbi za boljšo zaščito pred vetrom, kar pomeni, da vaša vožnja nikoli ne bo utrujajoča ali neudobna. Vključen zadnji nosilec in 39-litrski kovček priskrbita več prostora za shranjevanje. Zelo pomembno pa je tudi udobje potnika, zato smo zgornjemu kovčku priložili tudi blazino za naslon. 
Obrnite se na pooblaščenega prodajalca izdelkov Yamaha, ki bo to visokokakovostno originalno dodatno opremo z veseljem namestil na vaš Tricity.

description.en: Four-piece overfender set for added protection and looks.

description.en:
Attach your SP Connect Phone Case or other SP ConnectTM compatible devices to your MTB with the BAR MOUNT PRO MTB. 
The mount is CNC milled out of aircraft-grade aluminum and fits standard and oversized handlebars. To further protect your smartphone the mount also has a unique vibration-dampening system that cuts G-forces by up to 40% (depending on bike & phone model). You can mount it with the positioning arm or as a direct clamp mount - both versions allow 360° rotation to find the perfect position.
description.sl-SI:
Priključite svoje ohišje za telefon SP Connect ali druge naprave, združljive s sistemom SP ConnectTM, na vozilo z nosilcem za krmilo PRO MTB. 
Nosilec je narejen iz aluminija, primernega za letalsko industrijo in izrezanega na CNC stroju, ter se prilega standardnim in velikim krmilom. Za dodatno zaščito pametnega telefona ima nosilec tudi edinstven sistem za blaženje tresljajev, ki zmanjša gravitacijske pospeške do 40 % (odvisno od modela motorja in telefona). Namestite lahko nosilec z roko ali neposredno kot objemko z nosilcem – obe različici omogočata 360° vrtenje, da najdete popoln položaj.

description.en: GYTR Maintenance set for revision of a Gearbox

Engineered specifically for WaveRunners, this fender hinges in the center to better protect hulls from docks designed for bigger boats. name.sl-SI: Čelada IXS Trigger (MIPS) za MTB/neutrjene poti

description.en:
Designed for MTB and Gravel riders, TRIGGER AM from iXS represents the very latest in open face helmet design and technology. 
Featuring a lower back and a 3-level adjustable visor, this modern goggle-compatible design is an ideal choice for Moro 07 and Wabash owners. For a high level of all-round head protection its ultra-light construction features a tough external shell fused directly to the internal EPS material using patented double inmould shell technology. 
The Vortex™ molded aeration system features numerous interconnected internal and external air flow channels for highly efficient cooling – and with its full range of horizontal and vertical adjustment the Ergofit™ Ultra system makes it easy to find the most comfortable setting while the Fidlock™ magnetic closure system ensures precision locking. 
Equipped with MIPS Multi-directional Impact Protection System technology and featuring EN1078, CPSC, KC certification, the TRIGGER AM provides high levels of protection and comfort on every ride.
description.sl-SI:
Čelada TRIGGER AM podjetja iXS je zasnovana za kolesarje MTB in kolesarje po neutrjenih poteh ter predstavlja najnovejšo zasnovo in tehnologijo odprtih čelad. 

Ta moderna zasnova je popolna izbira za lastnike modelov Moro 07 in Wabash, saj je združljiva z očali, ima nižji hrbtni del in tristopenjsko nastavljivi ščitnik. Za visoko raven vsestranske zaščite glave ima njena ultra lahka konstrukcija trdo zunanjo lupino, pritrjeno neposredno na notranji material EPS z uporabo patentirane tehnologije lupine z dvojnim kalupom. 

Vdelan prezračevalni sistem Vortex™ ima številne medsebojno povezane notranje in zunanje kanale za pretok zraka za zelo učinkovito hlajenje, sistem Ergofit™ Ultra s celotnim naborom vodoravnih in navpičnih nastavitev omogoča enostavno iskanje najbolj udobne nastavitve, magnetni sistem zapiranja Fidlock™ pa zagotavlja natančno zaklepanje. 

Čelada TRIGGER AM je opremljena s tehnologijo sistema večsmerne zaščite pred udarci (MIPS), ima certifikate EN1078, CPSC in KC ter zagotavlja visoko raven zaščite in udobja na vsaki vožnji.

description.en: The Ténéré GYTR Handling Kit has been meticulously engineered to get your bike's chassis ready for rally. Featuring race-developed 48mm KYB closed cartridge forks with DLC coated tubes and increased stroke, alongside a GYTR triple clamp assembly and fully adjustable steering damper manufactured by Scotts Performance, this kit ensures superior stability and control over rough terrain. Paired with a Paioli shock absorber, GYTR rally wheels prepared by Haan Wheels, upgraded braking system with Brembo calipers and GYTR ECU for ABS system deletion, these enhancements improve the off-road capability of your Ténéré. Complete with a lightweight chain and sprocket set, new radiator assembly with oil cooler and GYTR radiator guard, as well as a high front fender, this kit equips you to conquer any off-road challenge with confidence and precision.

description.en: Street legal stainless steel exhaust system from Akrapovic. featuring real carbon heat sheals for additional protection. The exhaust saves weight and provides exiting sounds.

With its compact dimensions and the excellent fuel efficiency the NMAX thrives in the hustle and bustle of the urban environment. To ensure space and comfort, the Urban pack offers the best experience for riding in those built-up areas. The high screen provides robust protection against wind, while it remains resistant to scratches and impact damage thanks to its hard-coated polycarbonate design. The 39L top case offers all the extra space you need and rests on a beautiful piece of alloy rear carrier, with its integrated design and rigorous testing guaranteeing year-after-year security and peace of mind while riding. The lockset for the top case comes included in the pack, while the back rest provides the rear passenger with optimum comfort. The Urban pack will make the NMAX your best friend in the city. 
Available now from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit these high quality Genuine Accessories to your NMAX.
description.sl-SI:
S kompaktnimi dimenzijami in odličnim izkoristkom goriva je model NMAX popolna izbira za uporabo v vrvežu urbanega okolja. Paket Urban zagotavlja dovolj prostora in udobja, zato omogoča kar najboljšo vožnjo po gosto pozidanih območjih. Visok vizir zagotavlja zanesljivo zaščito pred vetrom, zaradi polikarbonatne zasnove s trdo prevleko pa je odporen tudi na praske in poškodbe ob trku. 39-litrski zgornji kovček poskrbi za dodaten prostor, nameščen pa je na čudovitem zadnjem nosilcu iz zlitine. Z integrirano zasnovo in po izvedbi striktnih testov zagotavlja varnost in brezskrbnost med vožnjo. Komplet ključavnice za zgornji kovček je priložen, naslon sedeža pa potniku zadaj omogoča optimalno udobje. S paketom Urban bo model NMAX postal vaš najboljši prijatelj za vožnjo po mestu. 
Obrnite se na pooblaščenega prodajalca izdelkov Yamaha, ki bo to visokokakovostno originalno dodatno opremo z veseljem namestil na vaš model NMAX.

description.en: The ultimate commuter combined with the perfect pack to roam the streets. The Street Pack contains a Fly Screen, Engine Protectors, Sub-cowl Covers, XSR-styled Radiator Side Covers and the extra stylish License Plate Holder 2.0.
description.sl-SI: Vrhunski motocikel za dnevne vožnje v kombinaciji s popolnim paketom za potepanje po cestah. Paket Street vsebuje zaščitni vizir, zaščite agregata, zaščite sprednje plastike, stranske zaščite hladilnika v slogu XSR in izredno moderen nosilec registrske tablice 2.0.

description.en: The Sport Pack adds a touch of sportiness to your MT-125 with its mix of accessories. The Fly Screen adds an aggressive, yet dynamic look for a true Dark Side of Japan feel. The sleek License Plate Holder sharpens up the rear, while stylish Engine Protectors make sure your engine is safeguarded while you ride as a true Master of Torque! Finally, the Tank Pad protects the tank of the bike from scratches. Are you ready to take the roads by storm?
description.sl-SI: Paket Sport Pack vsebuje razno dodatno opremo in vašemu modelu MT-125 doda pridih športnosti. Kratek vizir dodaja agresiven, a še vedno dinamičen videz, da resnično doživite temno plat Japonske. Vitek nosilec registrske tablice poskrbi za izrazitejši videz zadnjega dela, elegantni ščitniki agregata pa varujejo vaš motor med vožnjo kot resničen gospodar navora! Zaščita rezervoarja pa varuje rezervoar kolesa pred praskami. Ste pripravljeni, da osvojite ceste?

description.en: Keep your investment looking its best, and protect it from the elements. This cover provides the ultimate protection against fading and the elements. It comes with the Vacu-Hold strapless tow system, eliminating billowing and buffeting. Therefore, the cover conforms to the shape of your WaveRunner.
description.sl-SI: Ohranite svojo naložbo v najboljšem stanju in jo zaščitite pred vremenskimi vplivi. Ta prevleka zagotavlja neprekosljivo zaščito pred bledenjem in posledicami vremenskih dejavnikov. Ima sistem Vacu-Hold za vleko s pripenjanjem brez trakov, ki prepreči napihovanje in plapolanje prevleke. Zato se popolnoma prilega obliki vašega vodnega skuterja WaveRunner.

description.en: Designed for track use only, the Adrenaline Pack is the quickest way to get increased performance from your R7. The full Akrapovič titanium exhaust system boosts power and saves weight – and the quick shifter enables clutchless gear shifting for racing-style, full-throttle acceleration. The R7 Adrenaline Pack also comes with a set of special racing covers and GB Racing crankcase protector as well as a billet front brake lever guard, tank side grip pads and smoked sports screen – and the rear seat cover and foot pedal adjuster kit enhance your racetrack potential even further. Are you ready for the track?
description.sl-SI: Paket Adrenaline je namenjen le za uporabo na stezi in je najhitrejši način, kako lahko iz svojega R7 dosežete boljše zmogljivosti. Celotni Akrapovičev izpušni sistem iz titana dvigne moč in zniža težo – sistem za hitro prestavljanje pa omogoča prestavljanje brez sklopke za pospeševanje s polnim plinom v dirkaškem slogu. Paket Adrenaline za R7 vsebuje tudi posebne dirkaške pokrove in ščitnik ohišja ročične gredi GB Racing ter ščitnik ročice zavore, stranske obloge rezervoarja za gorivo in zatemnjen športni vizir – pokrov zadnjega sedeža in komplet za nastavitev stopalke pa še dodatno povzdigneta vaš dirkaški potencial. Ste pripravljeni za stezo?

Ta komplet, poleg izboljšanega oprijema in zaščite pred praskami, ki ju omogočajo stranske obloge rezervoarja, poskrbi tudi za bolj agresiven videz, saj vključuje namensko izdelan zatemnjen vizir, črne ročice ter nosilec registrske tablice. Allowing you to experience improved grip and scratch protection thanks to the side tank pads, this pack also provides a more aggressive aesthetic through a purpose-built smoked fly screen, black levers and a licence plate holder. Upgrade your ride and feel the Darkness.
Maximize your top-end horsepower with this Performance Camshaft Kit.

Podaljša življenjsko dobo motorja tako, da tvori zaščitni film, ki zmanjšuje trenje. Priporočljivo za motorna kolesa z mokrimi sklopkami.
description.en: Yamalube® Mineral 10W40 4-Stroke Oil is the ideal multi-purpose oil designed for 4-stroke sports, road and off-road motorcycles, scooters, ATVs and quads. It extends engine life by forming a protective film that reduces friction. Recommended for motorcycles with oil-soaked clutches.

description.sl-SI: Visibility is an important factor when riding a motorcycle so a clean visor is paramount. Cleaning a visor while on the move without the right materials can lead to permanent damage to the visor that is often expensive to replace. Yamalube® Visor & Helmet Cleaner is the ideal solution to cleaning the helmet and visor while on the go.
description.en: Visibility is an important factor when riding a motorcycle so a clean visor is paramount. Cleaning a visor while on the move without the right materials can lead to permanent damage to the visor that is often expensive to replace. Yamalube® Visor & Helmet Cleaner is the ideal solution to cleaning the helmet and visor while on the go.

name.sl-SI: Olje Yamalube® za 4-taktne snežne sani – OW-30

description.en: This is the ultimate lubrication partner for your machine when you're climbing up into the really low temperature zones or lowering the  degrees by blasting the trails on a clear frosty morning! It's a fully synthetic, premium quality oil  that is specially formulated to meet and surpass the very high standards we set for all 4-stroke engines in Yamaha snowmobiles and the gearbox/transmission trains on our 2-stroke models. So choose the best.
description.sl-SI: To je najboljši partner za mazanje vašega motorja, ko se vzpenjate na območja z res nizko temperaturo ali pa se na jasno, ledeno jutro odpravite na teren pri nizkih temperaturah. To je popolnoma sintetično olje vrhunske kakovosti, izdelano posebej zato, da izpolnjuje in presega zelo visoke standarde, ki jih postavljamo za vse 4-taktne agregate pri snežnih saneh Yamaha ter za menjalnike pri dvotaktnih modelih. Izberite najboljše.

description.en: High density 50.4V/19.2Ah lithium-ion battery giving a range of 37km*– and range can be extended by purchasing this optional extra battery. Two batteries can be installed on NEO’s simultaneously, extending the riding range up to 68km*.  For more convenience, you can also keep a spare battery at home. This 8kg battery is designed to maintain a high level of efficiency for 1000 cycles/10,000km, and charging can be carried out with batteries fitted to the scooter or when removed. (*Tested in WMTC Class 1 in STD mode, fully charged battery at a temperature of 25°C.)
description.sl-SI: Litij-ionska baterija s 50.4 V/19.2 Ah z visoko gostoto omogoča doseg do 37 km*, ki ga lahko še povečate, če kupite izbirno dodatno baterijo. V vozila NEO's je mogoče namestiti dve bateriji hkrati ter s tem podaljšati doseg za vožnjo do 68 km*.  Za več udobja pa lahko dodatno baterijo hranite tudi doma. Ta 8-kilogramska baterija je zasnovana tako, da ohranja visoko raven učinkovitosti 1000 ciklov/10.000 km, polnjenje pa se lahko izvaja, ko je baterija nameščena v skuter ali ko je odstranjena. (*Testirano v WMTC razred 1, v načinu STD, s popolnoma napolnjeno baterijo pri temperaturi 25 °C.)

Evoke the soul of the Dark Side of Japan with the new Sport Pack for the MT-10.
Created to give you a full on immersive experience with your MT-10, the Sport Pack will take your ride to the next level.
Did we mention the looks? Containing all must-have sport accessories, the pack gives an even sportier and more aggressive look, worthy of the definitive Master of Torque.
description.sl-SI:
Z novim kompletom dodatne opreme 'Sport Pack' za MT-10 prebudite temno plat Japonske. 
Ustvarjen, da vam zagotovi popolno popotniško izkušnjo z motorjem MT-10, zato Sport Pack predstavlja še korak naprej. 
Ali smo že omenili izgled? Z vsemi športnimi dodatki, ki jih morate imeti, paket zagotavlja še bolj športen in bolj agresiven videz, vreden resničnega gospodarja navora.

name.en: ATV Thumb Warmer by Heat Demon

description.en: Keeps riders thumbs warm in the cold weather.

name.sl-SI: Paket 'Sport Pack Pro Black' za MT-09

description.sl-SI: Vrhunski videz in zmogljivosti so za MT-09 standardne, zdaj pa ga lahko nadgradite s paketom 'Sport Pack Pro Black', ki je zasnovan tako, da bo vaš motocikel še bolj izstopal. Za dopolnitev hitre in vznemirljive izkušnje vožnje z modelom MT-09, črni popolni izpušni sistem Akrapovič poudarja ikonično rjovenje agregata CP3 ter čisti adrenalin, ki ga doživljamo z vsakim zasukom plina. Skupaj z ogledali na krmilu v obliki romba, črno obarvanim kratkim vizirjem in elegantnim nosilcem registrske tablice ti skrbno izbrani dodatki izboljšajo agresiven in športen videz vašega motornega kolesa. Blazinice za rezervoar in stranski oprijem – zasnovane posebej za MT-09 – izboljšajo nadzor in stabilnost pri vožnji v ovinkih, hkrati pa ščitijo rezervoar pred praskami. Ste pripravljeni, da svojo vožnjo popeljete na naslednjo raven?
description.en: Class-leading looks and performance are standard on the MT-09, but now you can take it to the next level with the Sport Pack Pro Black, designed to make your bike stand out from the crowd even more. To complement the fast and thrilling experience of riding the MT-09, the black Akrapovič Full Exhaust System accentuates the CP3’s iconic roar, emphasising the pure adrenaline delivered with every twist of the throttle. Together with the diamond-shaped bar end mirrors, black-tinted fly screen and a sleek licence plate holder, these carefully selected accessories enhance your bike’s sharp and sporty looks. Finally, the tank pad and side grip pads—designed specifically for the MT-09—improve control and stability when tackling corners, while also protecting the tank from scratches. Are you ready to push your ride to the next level?
GYTR® Rear Sprocket 40T (Marchesini Wheels)

This cooler is ideal for keeping your beverages and snacks cool while on the water, or for any other outdoor activity. The zippered storage compartment easily holds 18 cans plus ice. The waterproof liner and high-density insulation keeps ice comparable to industry leading brands. It also fits in the bow storage compartment of the FX, VX, and GP1800 series WaveRunners..
description.sl-SI: Hladilna torba je idealen za vzdrževanje temperature vaše pijače in prigrizkov, ko ste na vodi ali pri kateri koli drugi dejavnosti na prostem. V torbi je prostora za 18 pločevink in led, zapira pa se z zadrgo. Vodoodporna podloga in gosta plast izolacije zagotavljata hlajenje, primerljivo z izdelki vodilnih znamk na trgu. Poleg tega se prilega prostoru za shranjevanje v premcu WaveRunnerjev serij FX, VX in GP1800.

Yamaha Easy Connect Rotary Steering System 150HP je zasnovan za graditelje čolnov in nudi enostaven in zanesljiv način usmerjanja čolna. Sistem je sestavljen iz več ključnih komponent, ki sodelujejo, da zagotovijo gladko in odzivno usmerjanje. Tukaj je pregled omenjenih komponent: Easy Connect Steering Helm (Single Helm) - YMEH10015000 Steering Cable - YMESC16XXXXX Bezel Kit - YMEB1B009000 Steering Wheel - naročite posebej.
description.en: Yamaha Easy Connect Rotary Steering System 150HP is designed for boat builders and provides a straightforward and reliable way to steer a boat. The system is composed of several key components that work together to ensure smooth and responsive steering. Here's a breakdown of the components mentioned: Easy Connect Steering Helm (Single Helm) - YMEH10015000 Steering Cable - YMESC16XXXXX Bezel Kit - YMEB1B009000 Steering Wheel - order separately.

description.en: The residues from dust, dirt and countless insects are the penalty we pay for our riding enjoyment – and not just on our helmets and visors, but on headlights and windscreens too! This can be a visibility and safety issue, but these handy wipes (with the polishing cloth included) solve the problem quickly – so keep them in your backpack!

Omenjeni ostanki lahko otežijo vidljivost in predstavljajo varnostno tveganje, vendar ti priročni vlažni robčki (z vključeno krpo za poliranje) to težavo hitro rešijo – pospravite jih kar v nahrbtnik!

description.sl-SI: Trpežna zaščita za vožnjo po ozkih območjih, visoke štore ali kamenje po poti.

description.en: We know how it feels to be left wanting for more space to stow away essentials, so we equipped the Urban Pack with an integrated rear carrier and beautifully designed 39L top case that gobbles up your helmet, extra luggage or anything else that you throw at it. An integral back rest pad gives your passenger a comfortable ride – and the high screen provides added wind protection while keeping your line of sight clear. Available now from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit these high quality Genuine Accessories to your Tricity 300.
description.sl-SI: Poznamo občutek, ko zmanjka prostora za shrambo nujnih potrebščin, zato smo Urbani paket opremili z vgrajenim zadnjim nosilcem in čudovito oblikovanim 39-litrskim kovčkom, ki sprejme vašo čelado, dodatno prtljago ali karkoli drugega, kar želite spraviti vanj. Vgrajen zadnji naslon skrbi za udobno vožnjo potnika – visok zaslon pa deluje kot dodatna zaščita pred vetrom in obenem omogoča čist pogled. Obrnite se na pooblaščenega prodajalca izdelkov Yamaha, ki bo to visokokakovostno originalno dodatno opremo z veseljem namestil na vaš Tricity 300.

description.en: Side stand extender to increase the stability of the motorbike when placed on the sidestand.
description.sl-SI: Podaljšek stranskega stojala za večjo stabilnost motornega kolesa, ko je na stranskem stojalu.
Prilagajanje Yamahinega skuterja NMAX začnite s kompletom NMAX 'Essentials Pack', ki zajema zaščito proti praskam NMAX, zaščito za konzolo NMAX in dizajnerski sedež NMAX.
description.en: Start your Yamaha NMAX customisation with the NMAX Essentials Pack, containing the Scratch Protection NMAX, Console Protection NMAX and Design Seat NMAX.
Carrier for easy mounting of Yamaha’s top cases.

description.sl-SI: Neopazna, a funkcionalna zaščita šasije pri padcu. Narejena po meri agregata in šasije. Poleg tega pa ti stranski drsniki okrepijo robustni videz vašega R125.
description.en: Discrete, yet functional, chassis protection in case of a fall. Made to fit the engine and chassis layout. These side sliders also provide an added look of toughness to your R125.

description.sl-SI: Čistilni gel Yamalube® je okolju prijazno, učinkovito, vsestransko čistilo na vodni osnovi za motorna kolesa, skuterje, izvenkrmne motorje, ATV-je in drugo.
description.en: Yamalube® Cleaning Gel is an eco-friendly, effective, water-based, all-round cleaner for motorcycles, scooters, outboard engines, ATVs and more.

name.en: GB Racing Cover set for R1 2015 >

description.sl-SI: Zaščita agregata BG Racing za primer trčenja ali padca motornega kolesa.
description.en: BG Racing engine protection in case of crash or bike drop.
Short stylish screen to enforce the looks of your MT-125.
Base to hold a GPS device.

description.sl-SI: Zaščitite svojo Yamaho R9 pred poškodbami s temi čudovito oblikovanimi, a vseeno funkcionalnimi ščitniki okvirja. Te trdne visokokakovostne komponente, ki so zasnovane tako, da dopolnjujejo lastnosti modela R9, nudijo zaščito, ne da bi vplivale na nagibni kot motornega kolesa.
description.en: Protect your Yamaha R9 from damage with these beautifully sculpted yet functional Frame Sliders. Designed to complement the asthestics of the R9, these tough high quality components offer protection while not affecting the banking angle of the bike.
The Genuine Yamaha Sliding Glass Rear Window keeps the elements out, maximizes airflow and allows easy cargo access from inside the cab.
description.sl-SI: Originalno Yamahino drsno stekleno zadnje okno zagotavlja zaščito pred vremenskimi vplivi, izboljšan pretok zraka in preprost dostop do prtljažnega prostora iz notranjosti kabine.

S svojim drznim in agresivnim videzom je MT-09 prava paša za oči, 'Sport Pack Black' pa to samo še nadgradi. Nosilec za zaključek krmila in ščitnika členkov zagotavljajo večjo zaščito pred vetrom, hkrati pa prispevajo k agresivnemu videzu sprednjega dela MT-09, skupaj z zatemnjenim kratkim vizirjem. Na zadnji strani preoblikovan nosilec registrske tablice izboljša drzen profil motornega kolesa. Zaključek zagotavljajo stranske blazinice za oprijem na rezervoarju, ki ne le ščitijo pred praskami, temveč nudijo tudi dodaten oprijem za samozavestno vožnjo v ovinkih.
description.en: With its bold and aggressive design, the MT-09 is already a real head-turner and the Sport Pack Black takes it even further. The bar end base and knuckle deflectors provide increased wind protection, while also enhancing the aggressive look of the MT-09’s front end alongside the black-tinted fly screen. At the rear, the streamlined licence plate holder enhances the bike’s sharp profile. The finishing touch is provided by the side tank grip pads that not only protect against scratches but also offer extra grip for confident cornering.
Stylish front inner bag for maximum practicality of your BOOSTER
description.sl-SI: Elegantna sprednja notranja torba za maksimalno praktičnost vašega modela BOOSTER

S paketom 'Adrenaline' za R9 nadgradite svojo vožnjo. Dodajte nabor visokokakovostne dodatne opreme, ki izboljša videz in zvok vašega R9. 

Vsebuje: Celoten izpušni sistem R9 Akrapovič, drsniki okvirja, nosilec registrske tablice, ščitnik kovinske ročice sprednje zavore, prevleka zadnjega sedeža, zatemnjen vizir.
description.en:
Rev up your ride with the R9 Adrenaline Pack. Add a range of high-quality accessories to enhance the look and sound of your R9. 

Contains: R9 Akrapovič Full System, Frame Sliders, License Plate Holder, Billet Front Brake Lever Guard, Rear Seat Cover, Smoke Windscreen.

description.sl-SI: 45-litrski zgornji kovček brez ključa je ustvarjen za sodobne pustolovce in popotnike ter je sodobna in elegantna rešitev za shranjevanje. Najsodobnejše zaklepanje brez ključa zagotavlja, da so vaše bistvene stvari varne pri vsaki vožnji.
description.en: Made for the modern adventurer and commuter, the Keyless Top Case 45L is a slick and stylish storage solution. Cutting-edge, keyless locking ensures your essentials are kept safe on every ride.
Stylish sticker set for the rims of 17" wheels.
Custom oil filler cap - replacing the original - for an extra stylish touch to your Yamaha.

Opremite se za pustolovščine ob koncu tedna s paketom TRACER 7 'Weekend Pack'. Izkusite izboljšano zaščito pred vetrom z visokim vizirjem in zaščitite rezervoar z zaščito za rezervoar »Road to Fuji«, medtem ko je vaša prtljaga varno shranjena v poltrdih stranskih torbah ABS. Ta paket združuje funkcionalnost s slogom za popoln vikend oddih.
description.en: Gear up for your weekend adventures with the TRACER 7 Weekend Pack. Enjoy enhanced wind protection with the High Screen, and protect your tank with the Road to Fuji Tank Pad while having your belongings secured in the Soft ABS Side Cases. This pack combines functionality with style for the perfect weekend break.

description.en: Yamaha also takes our young and small water fanatics' safety into consideration. Our Yamaha Lifestyle 100N can ensure our kids' safety while having fun on the water. The bright orange colour featuring the retro-reflecting tapes can be seen clearly on the water and from the shore.
description.sl-SI: Yamaha poskrbi tudi za varnost svojih mladih in majhnih vodnih navdušencev. Rešilni jopič Yamaha 100N zagotavlja varnost otrok med zabavnimi aktivnostmi v vodi. Svetlo oranžno barvo z retro-odsevnimi trakovi lahko vidite tako iz vode, kot tudi z obale.

Z elegantnim paketom 'Street' stilsko dopolnite videz svojega motornega kolesa XSR900. Paket poskrbi za vrhunski končni izgled, s katerim se vaš XSR prelevi v kultno urbano motorno kolo. Sprednji del polepšajte s športnim vizirjem za nadzorno ploščo z zračnikom, ščitnikom žarometa in črnim aluminijastim sprednjim blatnikom. Izboljšajte oprijem na rezervoarju s kolenskimi blazinicami za gladko vožnjo skozi zavoje in vrhunski nadzor ter z nosilcem registrske tablice pričarajte čist in še bolj športen videz zadnjega dela.
description.en: Providing your XSR900 with an extra sleek look is easy with the stylish Street Pack. The pack ensures an extra premium finish that easily customizes your XSR into an urban hero. Style the front end with the sporty air-vented cockpit visor, headlight guard and black aluminum front fender. Increase your grip on the tank with the knee grips pads for those faster corners and ultimate riding control while the license plate holder cleans up the rear end with an even sportier look.

description.sl-SI: S svojim drznim in agresivnim videzom je MT-09 prava paša za oči, 'Sport Pack Silver' pa to samo še nadgradi. Nosilec za zaključek krmila in ščitnika členkov zagotavljajo večjo zaščito pred vetrom, hkrati pa prispevajo k agresivnemu videzu sprednjega dela MT-09, skupaj z aluminijastim vizirjem. Na zadnji strani preoblikovan nosilec registrske tablice izboljša drzen profil motornega kolesa. Zaključek zagotavljajo stranske blazinice za oprijem na rezervoarju, ki ne le ščitijo pred praskami, temveč nudijo tudi dodaten oprijem za samozavestno vožnjo v ovinkih.
description.en: With its bold and aggressive design, the MT-09 is already a real head-turner and the Sport Pack Silver takes it even further. The bar end base and knuckle deflectors provide increased wind protection, while also enhancing the aggressive look of the MT-09’s front end alongside the aluminium visor. At the rear, the streamlined licence plate holder enhances the bike’s sharp profile. The finishing touch is provided by the side tank grip pads that not only protect against scratches but also offer extra grip for confident cornering.

Komplet TRACER 9 'Travel Pack Pro' je vrhunski sklop opreme za voznike, ki zahtevajo udobje, priročnost in vsestranskost. Visok vizir in dodaten širok zaščitni vizir zagotavljata odlično zaščito pred vetrom, ogrevan udoben sedež in sopotnikov sedež pa prinašata udobje vam kakor tudi sopotniku med dolgimi vožnjami. V opremo so vključeni sistem za nadzor tlaka v pnevmatikah (TPMS) in ogrevane ročke, da lahko vozite samozavestno ne glede na vremenske razmere. Zgornji kovček in stranska kovčka ponujajo dovolj prostora za shranjevanje vseh vaših bistvenih stvari, medtem ko polnilnik USB in vtičnica držala ohranjata vaše naprave pripravljene in dostopne.

Nosilec za GPS omogoča enostavno uporabo navigacije, zaradi ščitnika hladilnika in zaščite agregata 'Explorer' pa je vožnja še bolj brezskrbna. Komplet meglenk LED in nosilec za meglenke zagotavljata optimalno vidljivost v vseh pogojih. Zavarujte vso svojo opremo z nosilno ploščo za zgornji kovček, kompleti nosilcev in kompletom ključev za cilindrično ključavnico za hiter dostop. S paketom TRACER 9 'Travel Pack Pro' je vsaka pustolovščina brezhibna mešanica sloga, udobja in funkcionalnosti.
description.en:
The TRACER 9 Travel Pack Pro is the ultimate setup for riders who demand comfort, convenience, and versatility. The High Screen and Add-On Wide Screen provide excellent wind protection, while the Heated Comfort Seat and Passenger Seat keep both you and your passenger comfortable during long rides. Equipped with a Tire Pressure Monitoring System (TPMS) and Heated Grips, you can ride confidently, no matter the weather. The Top Case and Side Cases offer ample storage for all your essentials, while the USB Charger and Holder Socket keep your devices ready and accessible.

Navigate easily with the GPS Stay, and ride with peace of mind knowing your bike is protected by the Radiator Guard and Explorer Engine Guard. The LED Fog Light Kit and Fog Light Stay ensure optimal visibility in any conditions. Secure all your gear with the Top Case Mounting Plate, Stay Kits, and Key Cylinder Set for quick access. With the TRACER 9 Travel Pack Pro, every adventure is a seamless blend of style, comfort, and function.
Wind deflectors for your feet, providing extra comfort and wind protection on long-distance journeys.

XSR700 is the perfect blank canvas for you to make your dream machine and the Street pack can be the first step to give it a classy and sharp look. 5 accessories, 1 style: the starting point to your creativity.
description.sl-SI: XSR700 je popolno prazno platno za izdelavo vašega sanjskega motorja, paket Street pa je lahko prvi korak, ki bo poskrbel za njegov eleganten in oster videz. 5 dodatkov, 1 slog: izhodišče za vašo ustvarjalnost.

This easy-to-use kit allows you to flush fresh water through the engine after every use, preventing salt and mineral build-up. It features a swivel hose fitting and fits all late-model WaveRunners equipped with factory flush kits. Available in red or blue.

description.en:
The MT-03 Sport Pack is designed to offer you a complete mix of accessories, to complement the aggressive look and reinforce its performance. The Radiator Cover gives protection against small stone/debris impact, while the Tank Pad adds protection to the fuel tank.
The Sport Screen is designed to provide wind protection to enjoy a thrilling ride. Finally, the License Plate Holder and LED Blinkers add an stylish look, making this motorbike one of the coolest looking bikes in its category.
description.sl-SI:
Komplet MT-03 Sport Pack vključuje popoln nabor dodatne opreme, ki poudarja agresiven videz in učinkovitost vašega motornega kolesa. Pokrov hladilnika zagotavlja zaščito pred poškodbami, ki nastanejo zaradi kamenčkov in/ali drugih delcev, zaščita rezervoarja pa dodatno varuje rezervoar za gorivo.
Športni vizir je zasnovan za zaščito pred vetrom in užitke med razburljivo vožnjo. Nosilec registrske tablice in LED-smerniki pa dodajo eleganten videz, s čimer poskrbijo, da je to eno najprivlačnejših motornih koles v svoji kategoriji.

description.en: Keep your investment looking its best, and protect it from the elements. With fast installation and removal, this cover provides the protection against color fading and the elements.
description.sl-SI: Ohranite svojo naložbo v najboljšem stanju in jo zaščitite pred vremenskimi vplivi. Ta prevleka, ki se hitro namesti in odstrani, zagotavlja zaščito pred bledenjem barv in posledicami vremenskih dejavnikov.

description.en: Protect your feet and lower legs in wet weather conditions from water splashing up from underneath the front wheels with the Mud Flaps. The flexible material ensures the flaps do not damage when leaving a higher curb,
description.sl-SI: Zaščitite stopala in spodnji del nog v mokrih vremenskih razmerah pred tem, da bi voda pod sprednjimi kolesi pljuskala na vas, z zavesicami koles. Prilagodljiv material zagotavlja, da se zavesice ne poškodujejo, ko prečkate višji robnik

description.en: Take your TMAX to the next level with the Sport pack. Containing all the must-have sport accessories, the pack gives an even sportier look to your TMAX. Make it truly yours by adding optional Gilles , Akrapovič and Ohlin’s parts. Available now from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit these high quality Genuine Accessories to your TMAX.
description.sl-SI: Nadgradite svoj model TMAX s kompletom 'Sport'. Komplet vsebuje vso športno dodatno opremo, ki jo preprosto morate imeti in ki vašemu modelu TMAX zagotavlja še bolj športen videz. Svojemu modelu TMAX dodajte dele družb Gilles, Akrapovič in Ohlin ter ga tako povsem prilagodite svojemu okusu. Obrnite se na pooblaščenega prodajalca izdelkov Yamaha, ki bo to visokokakovostno originalno dodatno opremo z veseljem namestil na vaš model TMAX.

description.en: Fine-tune how power is delivered in different terrains and conditions by upgrading your Wolverine RMAX 1000 with this illuminated D-Mode switch. Sport Mode provides the most exciting experience, while Trail Mode smooths out the ride for greater comfort and Crawl Mode transfers the power to the ground with maximum efficiency - for optimal traction.

Način Sport zagotavlja najvznemirljivejšo izkušnjo, način Trail ublaži vožnjo za več udobja, način Crawl pa prenaša moč na tla z najvišjo stopnjo učinkovitosti – za najboljši oprijem.

name.en: Hard Cab Enclosure System Glass Front Windshield with Wiper
name.sl-SI: Steklen sprednji vizir z brisalcem kompleta za zapiranje kabine v trdi izvedbi

description.en: Yamaha is offering all the components of the Hard Cab Enclosure System separately for added customer convenience. When rain, snow, dust and/or dirt start flying, a glass front windshield keeps you and your riders protected. Designed for simple installation and a perfect fit, this integrated pre-installed windshield features both a wiper and washer system. A fluid bottle for the washer system is nestled nicely under the hood area for easy filling and no loss of precious storage space.
description.sl-SI: Yamaha za lažjo uporabo vse sestavne dele kompleta za zapiranje kabine v trdi izvedbi ponuja ločeno. Ko ste vi in vaši potniki izpostavljeni dežju, snegu, prahu in/ali umazaniji, vas zaščiti steklen sprednji vizir. Ta vgrajeni prednameščeni vizir je zasnovan tako, da je nameščanje preprosto in da se popolnoma prilega vozilu, vključuje pa tudi sistem za brisanje in pranje stekel. Vsebnik s tekočino za sistem pranja stekel je vgrajen pod pokrovom za lažje polnjenje, pri tem pa ne izgubite dragocenega prostora za shranjevanje.

description.en: The Bed Lighting will illuminate the Wolverine® RMAX™ 2 1000 and X2 850 cargo beds when you’re hunting, working or simply enjoying the  trails at night.

description.sl-SI: Paket TRACER 9 GT 'Travel Pack' vsebuje ustrezne dodatke, ki poskrbijo za večje udobje na dolgih vožnjah. Visok vizir še bolje ščiti pred vetrom in drugimi vplivi ter vozniku zagotavlja prijeten položaj. Udoben sedež poskrbi za večje udobje pri daljšem sedenju, zato je to dobra izbira za dolge vožnje. Zgornji kovček in vsi dodatki, potrebni za namestitev, zagotavljajo neverjeten 45-litrski dodatni prostor za shranjevanje, kamor lahko shranite dve integralni čeladi. Kovček lahko dodatno prilagodite tako, da se barvna plošča ujema z barvo modela TRACER 9 GT.
description.en: For added comfort during long distance Touring, the TRACER 9 GT Travel Pack provides your motorcycle with just the right extra touches. The High Screen deflects even more wind and elements to provide the rider a pleasant protected position. The Comfort Seat is there to increase the comfort of seating for a longer period of time, making it an excellent addition for longer rides. The Top Case and all accessories needed to mount it provide an incredible 45 L extra storage space that can house two full face helmets if needed. The case can also be detailed to perfection with a color plate to match the color of your TRACER 9 GT.

The MT-09 invented the Hyper Naked category. The breath-taking combination of its high torque CP3 engine and a dynamic sports chassis is designed to get your adrenaline pumping. And since day one it’s been the bike of choice for every rider who appreciates what real motorcycling is all about. In standard trim it’s the most impressive bike in the class – but when you want to take the aggressive looks to the next level the Sport Pack is surely the way to go.
description.sl-SI: Model MT-09 je izumil kategorijo Hyper Naked. Dih jemajoča kombinacija visokega navora agregata CP3 in dinamične športne šasije je zasnovana tako, da vam požene adrenalin. In že od prvega dne je bil ta motocikel prva izbira vsakega voznika, ki ceni bistvo pravega motociklizma. V različici z osnovno opremo je najbolj impresiven motocikel v svojem razredu – če pa želite agresiven videz dvigniti na naslednjo raven, pa je Sport Pack zagotovo prava izbira.

Opremite svoje motorno kolo TRACER 7 s kompletom 'Urban Pack' za vrhunsko mestno udobje. Nosilec zgornjega kovčka in zgornji kovček zagotavljata dovolj prostora za shranjevanje, medtem ko naslonjalo za potnika poskrbi za udobje. S kompletom 'Urban Pack', ki je dopolnjen z visokim vizirjem za dodatno zaščito pred vetrom, nadgradite mestno vožnjo s praktičnostjo in slogom.
description.en: Equip your TRACER 7 with the Urban Pack for ultimate city convenience. The Top Case Carrier and Top Case provide ample storage, while the Backrest adds comfort for your passenger. Completed with a High Screen for added wind protection, the Urban Pack enhances your urban ride with practicality and style.

description.sl-SI: Z univerzalnim ovitkom za telefon lahko uporabite vsak pametni telefon (največja velikost telefona je navedena spodaj) na kateri koli SP Connect™.  Namestite, da bi lahko z vrtljivim zaklepnim mehanizmom svoj telefon varno pritrdili na kolo, v avtomobil, na vozilo za golf itd. Preprosto potisnite pametni telefon v ovitek, zavihajte odprtino in zaprite zavihek. Tako bo vaš telefon zaščiten pred dežjem, znojem, blatom in prahom, uporabnost zaslona na dozik pa ostane enaka.
description.en: With the Universal phone case, you can use just about any smartphone (max phone size indicated) on any of the mounts to secure your phone to your motorcycle or scooter. With its twist-lock mechanism to install. Simply push the smartphone into the case and roll up the opening and close the tab. This way your phone remains protected from rain, sweat, mud, and dust, still offering the same touchscreen usability.​

description.en: Yamaha‘s WaveRunner covers are designed to help protect your watercraft‘s appearance. Each cover features superior construction and materials to help provide long life as well as a custom fit. Features include Vacu-Hold® design, which creates a vacuum inside the cover during transit to draw the cover down snugly to the WaveRunner. Benefits include reduced air-induced stress on the seams, and less aerodynamic drag.
description.sl-SI: Yamahine prevleke za WaveRunner so namenjene za zaščito videza vašega plovila. Vsaka prevleka je natančno zasnovana in izdelana iz materialov, ki zagotavljajo dolgotrajno uporabo in popolno prileganje. Lastnosti prevleke vključujejo tehnologijo VACU-Hold®, ki znotraj prevleke med transportom ustvarja vakuum, da se prevleka lahko tesno prilega WaveRunnerju. Prednosti vključujejo zmanjšano obrabo šivov zaradi ujetega zraka in manjši aerodinamični upor.

description.en: The TTX GP is the latest shock absorber for hyper sport and sport bikes. It features the TTX twin tube technology and has been developed with the latest technology from Öhlins vast experiences in MotoGP. The compression and rebound damping adjustments are improved by a new adjustment needle with better guidance and different flow restriction behavior. It gives a more precise adjustment and constant function. The adjustment range is also wider and variations between shock absorbers are reduced. And improved chassis feedback as well as improved performance for the rider have been obtained. The new main piston gives the rider much better traction and feeling which means improved control. The TTX GP is further optimized and shares all other benefits with the TTX36 shock absorber.
With the GYTR Cylinder Head Gasket, you can increase compression ratio because of the lower thickness

Zgornji del ima vdolbine na dnu, kamor lahko vstavite obešalnike za oblačila, podpora za čelado pa se lahko prilagodi tako, da centrira motoristično ali kolesarsko čelado.

Ta natančno prilegajoč se dodatek z lahkotnim dizajnom in posebnim mat črnim premazom, ki zagotavlja trpežnost, omogoča brezskrbnost pred udarci majhnih kamnov in drugih delcev, ko se odpravite na cesto ali stezo.
description.en: Protect your R9's radiator against road debris impact with the Aluminium Radiator Guard. Lightweight in design and equipped with a special matt-black coating to ensure durability, this precise-fitting accessory offers peace of mind against small stone and debris impact as you take to the road or the track.

name.en: Öhlins Cartridge Kit Race - NIX 22 USD
name.sl-SI: Komplet vložkov za dirkanje Öhlins – NIX 22 USD

description.en: The Öhlins NIX 22 USD cartridge kit comes directly from experience gained in the World Supersport 300 championship. It doesn’t matter if you are heading for a World Championship title or if you are taking your bike to the local race track. This cartridge kit will give you loads of performance, stable damping characteristics and fantastic comfort. The kit has a unique NIX design with compression damping and pre-load adjustment on the left leg, rebound damping and pre-load adjustment on the right leg, while all adjustments are easily made at the top cap.
description.sl-SI: Komplet vložkov Öhlins NIX 22 USD je neposreden odraz izkušenj, pridobljenih na prvenstvu World Supersport 300. Ni pomembno, ali se borite za naslov svetovnega prvaka ali pa s kolesom dirkate na lokalnem dirkališču. Ta komplet vložkov vam zagotavlja boljše zmogljivosti, zanesljivo blaženje in izredno udobje. Komplet ima edinstveno zasnovo NIX s kompresijskim blaženjem in nastavljivo predobremenitvijo za levo nogo ter povratnim blaženjem in nastavljivo predobremenitvijo za desno nogo, vse nastavitve pa lahko enostavno prilagajate na zgornjem pokrovčku.

description.en: If a full fairing is your memory of the 80's, the Racer Pack is the perfect cure for the longing! With a lower fairing matching the unit colours, plus a tinted dark screen, the Racer Pack enhances the XSR 900 GP retro look. The pack also includes a license plate holder to sharpen up the rear and a beautifully crafted Akrapovič exhaust to add to the 80's nostalgia.
description.sl-SI: Če pogrešate 80-a leta, je 'Racer Pack' popolna rešitev za to! S spodnjo oblogo, ki se ujema z barvami enote, in temnim vizirjem bo 'Racer Pack' dopolnil retro videz modela XSR 900 GP. Paket vključuje tudi nosilec registrske tablice za dodaten učinek na zadnjem delu in dovršeno izdelan izpuh Akrapovič, ki dopolnjuje pridih 80-ih.

description.en: Featuring a body manufactured from forged aluminium, the VX trail pedal combines a low weight with high levels of durability, making this a perfect option for mountain terrain and gravel trails. Its CNC machined chromoly steel axle is fitted with double sealed cartridge bearings and full roller bearings for highly efficient operation with superior longevity – and the heat treated VX bindings give a precise and predictable fit. Supplied with one pair of SPD compatible cleats.

Njegova gred iz krom-molibden jekla, izdelana s strojem CNC, je opremljena z dvojno zatesnjenimi ležaji in polnimi valjčnimi ležaji za visoko učinkovito delovanje z vrhunsko življenjsko dobo – toplotno obdelane vezi VX pa se natančno in predvidljivo prilegajo. Priložen je en par bitev, združljivih s SPD.

description.en: The Sport Pack adds a touch of sportiness with its mix of accessories. The fly screen gives the front an unmistakably understated yet strong look, while the LED lights (front and rear) add to the equation. The sleek license plate holder sharpens up the rear. Finally, the side tank pad set not only protects the tank from scratches, but also gives that extra grip when you are setting the corners on fire! Are you ready to take the roads by storm?

Vizir daje sprednjemu delu komaj opazen in razpoznaven, vendar hkrati močan videz, za kar še dodatno poskrbijo LED-žarometi (sprednji in zadnji). Vitek nosilec registrske tablice poskrbi za izrazitejši videz zadnjega dela. Stranska zaščita za rezervoar varuje rezervoar pred praskami, poleg tega pa nudi dodaten oprijem pri premagovanju ovinkov! description.en: Specially designed Camshaft for racing, allowing better performance.

With a spacious capacity of 20 liters, Yamaha’s Adventure Backpack is a must-have accessory when you’re heading out into the mountains or trails for a longer ride. Its ergonomic design features a padded strap harness and adjustable chest and waist bands to ensure a perfect fit with a high level of comfort – and an integrated CE approved back protector provides added safety.  Multiple internal compartments provide plenty of storage for food, drink and more – and a centrally located padded battery compartment gives you the opportunity to enjoy longer rides.
description.sl-SI:
Yamahin pustolovski nahrbtnik je s prostornino 20 litrov obvezna dodatna oprema, ko se odpravite v gore, na pot ali na daljšo vožnjo. Njegova ergonomska zasnova ima podložene naramnice in nastavljiva pasova čez prsa in trebuh, da zagotovi popolno prileganje z visoko stopnjo udobja, dodatno varnost pa zagotavlja integriran ščitnik hrbta s certifikatom CE. 

Več notranjih žepov nudi veliko prostora za shranjevanje hrane, pijače in še več, podložen predal za baterijo, ki se nahaja na sredini, pa vam daje priložnost, da uživate na daljših vožnjah.

description.en: Developed for the most ambitious YZ65 riders who are aiming for the top, the premium quality GYTR® High Performance Race Kit consists of all the key tuning components needed to achieve race-winning performance. Easy to fit, it’s the quickest route to the chequered flag!
description.sl-SI: Dirkalni komplet za visoko zmogljivost GYTR® najboljše kakovosti je izdelan za najbolj ambiciozne voznike motorja YZ65, ki ciljajo na sam vrh. Sestavljen je iz vseh ključnih sestavnih delov za nastavitve, ki pomagajo doseči zmogljivost, s katero se zmaguje na dirkah. Komplet je preprost za namestitev in predstavlja najhitrejšo pot do zmage.

description.en: The lightweight and stylish Tricity 300 comes with best-in-class specifications which make it a fashionable and dynamic 3-wheel scooter. For an extra dose of dynamism and even sportier looks, the Sport Pack consists of a scratch-resistant sports screen, minimalistic license plate holder with LED rear license plate light, and aluminium lower foot boards with high-grip rubber pads. Available now from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit these high quality Genuine Accessories to your Tricity 300.
description.sl-SI: Lahek in eleganten Tricity 300 ima najboljše specifikacije v svojem razredu, zaradi česar je ta 3-kolesni skuter moden in dinamičen. Za dodatno dozo dinamičnosti in še bolj športen videz poskrbi Športni paket, ki vsebuje na praske odporen športni zaslon, minimalističen nosilec za registrsko tablico z LED lučko in aluminijaste plošče za noge z blazinicami iz gume. Obrnite se na pooblaščenega prodajalca izdelkov Yamaha, ki bo to visokokakovostno originalno dodatno opremo z veseljem namestil na vaš Tricity 300.
Celoten izpušni sistem GYTR, ki izboljša dovod zraka v Yamahin agregat za večjo moč.
description.en: Full GYTR exhaust system to enhance the air intake of the Yamaha engine for improved power output.

Nepogrešljiv dodatek za daljšo življenjsko dobo verige, vrhunsko zmogljivost in učinkovito porabo goriva. Priročna 56-mililitrska embalaža je priročna na daljših poteh in jo lahko napolnite s 300-mililitrsko pločevinko.
description.en: Yamalube® Chain Lube is ideal for road motorcycles, with a high-adhesion formula that creates a 'throw-off' resistant lubricating film able to withstand extreme pressures. Essential for longer chain life, peak performance and fuel efficiency. The 56ml Chain Lube is handy for longer rides and is refillable from the 300ml size.

description.en: Gravel shield to protect the engine from fall damage, made from a strong steel tube construction in full adventure style.

description.sl-SI: MT-09 je utelešenje vsestranskosti. Ta urbana ikona s športno dušo je namenjena več kot le mestnim vožnjam – ustvarjena je za resno zabavo na ovinkastih gorskih cestah.  Zato smo izdelali 'Touring Pack', ki vam zagotavlja, da imate na voljo vse bistvene stvari za daljše vožnje z vašim motociklom MT-09. Srednji vizir in ščitnika členkov zagotavljajo boljšo zaščito pred vetrom, hkrati pa ohranjajo temeljno agresivno podobo modela MT-09. Za večje udobje paket vključuje udobne sedeže za vas in vašega sopotnika. Potrebujete tudi prtljažni prostor? Mehki stranski torbi s skupno prostornino 28 l, ki jo je mogoče razširiti do 42 l, sta opremljeni z vodoodporno notranjostjo in omogočata dovolj prostora za pakiranje vsega, kar potrebujete za oddih konec tedna.
description.en: The MT-09 is the embodiment of versatility. This urban icon with a sporty soul is meant for more than just city rides—it’s built for serious fun on twisty mountain roads.  That’s why we crafted the Touring Pack, ensuring you have all the essentials for longer rides on your MT-09. The middle screen and knuckle deflectors provide enhanced wind protection, while still maintaining the core aggressive look of the MT-09. For increased comfort, the pack includes comfort seats for both you and your passenger. Need luggage space as well? The soft side bags, offering a total capacity of 28L and expandable up to 42L, come with waterproof inner bags, giving you plenty of room to pack everything you need for a weekend getaway.

description.sl-SI: Nadgradite motorno kolo TRACER 9 GT+ s potovalnim kompletom 'Travel Pack', ki prinaša udobje in priročnost. Visok vizir ponuja odlično zaščito pred vetrom, medtem ko zgornji kovček z naslonjalom zagotavlja dovolj prostora za shranjevanje in udobje za dolge vožnje. Ta komplet je kot nalašč za vsako potovanje, saj združuje praktičnost in slog.
description.en: Enhance your TRACER 9 GT+ with the Travel Pack, designed for comfort and convenience. The High Screen offers excellent wind protection, while the Top Case with Backrest provides ample storage and comfort for long rides. Perfect for every journey, this pack combines practicality with style.

name.sl-SI: Olje za tekmovalne namene Yamalube® za dvotaktne motorje za terensko vožnjo (2R)

description.en: Yamalube® 2R is the ultimate oil for ultimate performance. In  extremes of temperature and under the toughest racing conditions, this ester-based premix lubricant really delivers. Motocross, Enduro, Trials, Quads … this is the hot one. Specially recommended when riding the amazing Yamaha YZ in competition.
description.sl-SI: Yamalube® 2R je vrhunsko olje za izredne zmogljivosti. To mazivo je vnaprej pripravljena mešanica, ki temelji na estru, in se odlično obnese pri ekstremnih temperaturah in v najtežjih dirkaških pogojih. Mazivo je primerno za motorna kolesa za motokros, enduro, in za štirikolesnike. Posebej priporočljiva uporaba, če na tekmovanjih vozite motorno kolo Yamaha YZ.

Convert your XSR900 to a ideal long-trip Roadster with the Weekend Pack. Fitting your bike with two 13,5 litre soft bags holding up to 5 kilograms each will allow you to pack your traveling essentials and go the extra mile. Easily fitting the bags with waterproof liners will protect your luggage from unfortunate weather conditions. The pack comes with an USB charger to charge your navigation or phone during the trip.
description.sl-SI: S kompletom 'Weekend Pack' pretvorite svoj XSR900 v popolno cestno motorno vozilo za dolga potovanja. Če na motorno kolo namestite dve 13,5-litrski mehki torbi z največjo obremenitvijo 5 kilogramov, boste lahko spakirali osnovne stvari za potovanja in se zapeljali še dlje. Z enostavno namestitvijo vodoodpornih oblog zaščitite svojo prtljago v slabih vremenskih razmerah. V kompletu je na voljo tudi polnilnik USB, s katerim boste med potovanjem lahko polnili navigacijski sistem ali telefon.

Fast and gentle cleaning for a sparkling clean result. The QUICK CLEANER does not require any additional water! Excellent for plastics, glass, paint, metals, windshields and visors. With the 360° spray system, the QUICK CLEANER can be used in all positions. Mode of use: Spray "YAMALUBE QUICK CLEANER" on a clean dry wipe and wipe the motorcycle/ATV/Outboard engine with it. Caution: Do not rub the motorcycle/ATV/Outboard engine with hard dirt particles.
