S sistemom pršenja za 360° lahko HITRO ČISTILO uporabljate v vseh položajih. Način uporabe: Razpršite HITRO ČISTILO YAMALUBE na čisto suho krpo in z njo obrišite motorno kolo/ATV/izvenkrmni motor. Pozor: Motornega kolesa/ATV-ja/izvenkrmnega motorja ne drgnite s trdimi delci umazanije.

description.en: Choose the Grip Heater for warm hands in cold riding conditions. This pair of electrically heated hand grips replaces the standard Yamaha TMAX scooter grips for heat on demand, all year round.

description.sl-SI:
TRACER 9 GT 'Travel Pack Pro' je zasnovan za voznike, ki iščejo maksimalno udobje, varnost in funkcionalnost na dolgih razdaljah. Visok vizir v kombinaciji z dodatnim širokim zaščitnim vizirjem omogoča boljšo zaščito pred vetrom, ogrevan udoben sedež in sopotnikov udoben sedež pa vozniku in sopotniku prinašata toploto in sproščenost. Ohranite nadzor s kompletom za nadzor tlaka v pnevmatikah in sistemom za nadzor tlaka v pnevmatikah (TPMS) na krmilu, nosilec za GPS pa omogoča jasen pregled nad navigacijo. Zgornji kovček in naslon zagotavljata veliko prostora za shranjevanje in udobje sopotnika, s polnilnikom USB z vtičnico na nosilcu pa poskrbite, da so vaše naprave vedno napolnjene.

Za dodatno zaščito pred kamenčki na cesti se namestita ščitnik hladilnika in zaščita agregata 'Explorer', komplet meglenk LED z nosilcem za meglenke pa zagotavlja vidljivost v vseh pogojih. Ta paket je popoln spremljevalec za vsako pustolovščino na vašem TRACER 9 GT.
description.en:
The TRACER 9 GT Travel Pack Pro is built for riders seeking maximum comfort, safety, and functionality on long-distance rides. The High Screen, paired with the Add-On Wide Screen, enhances wind protection, while the Heated Comfort Seat and Passenger Comfort Seat ensure warmth and relaxation for both rider and passenger. Stay in control with the Tire Pressure Monitoring Kit and TPMS on the handlebar, while the GPS Stay keeps your navigation in clear view. The Top Case and Backrest provide ample storage and comfort for your passenger, and the USB Charger with Holder Socket ensures your devices remain powered.

For added protection, the Radiator Guard and Explorer Engine Guard shield your bike from road debris, and the LED Fog Light Kit with Fog Light Stay ensures visibility in all conditions. This pack  is the ultimate companion for every adventure on your TRACER 9 GT.

The Öhlins NIX 30 Cartridge Kit for standard KYB fork was developed in racing series such as World Supersport and Superstock championships, and offers loads of performance, stability and suppleness. This kit has a unique design, with the compression damping in the left fork leg while the right leg controls rebound damping. This allows not only for a more precise function and better stability, but also the ease of having all adjustments conveniently placed at the top of the fork.
description.sl-SI: Komplet vložkov Öhlins NIX 30 za standardne vilice KYB je bil razvit v sklopu dirkaške serije, kot so svetovno prvenstvo Supersport in prvenstva Superstock, ter omogoča izredno zmogljivost, stabilnost ter okretnost. Ta komplet ima edinstveno zasnovo s kompresijskim blaženjem v levem kraku vilic, medtem ko desni krak nadzoruje povratno blaženje. To omogoča bolj natančno delovanje in boljšo stabilnost, vse prilagoditve pa so priročno nameščene na vrh vilic.
S parom ščitnikov za zaščito oklepa, ki so enostavni za montažo, zaščitite zadnji del svojega skuterja Yamaha XMAX pred praskami.

Priključite svoj ovitek za telefon SP Connect ali druge naprave, združljive s sistemom SP ConnectTM, na motocikel z Moto Mount Pro. Nosilec je narejen iz aluminija, primernega za letalsko industrijo in izrezanega na CNC stroju ter se prilega standardnim in velikim krmilom. Za dodatno zaščito vašega pametnega telefona ima nosilec tudi edinstven sistem za blaženje tresljajev, ki zmanjša G-sile za do 40 % (odvisno od modela motocikla in telefona). Namestite lahko nosilec z roko ali neposredno kot objemko z nosilcem – obe različici omogočata 360° vrtenje, da najdete popoln položaj.
description.en: Attach your SP Connect phone case, or other SP ConnectTM compatible devices to your motorbike with the Moto Mount Pro. The mount is CNC milled out of aircraft-grade aluminum and fits standard and oversized handlebars. To further protect your smartphone, the mount also has a unique vibration dampening system that cuts G-forces by up to 40% (depending on bike & phone model). You can mount it with the positioning arm or as a direct clamp mount - both versions allow 360° rotation to find the perfect position.
The Front Winch Mount Kit includes everything needed to install a VRX Series winch.

description.en: Introducing Yamaha's Rear Sequential LED Blinker Kit for the Ténéré 700 – Redefining safety and elegance on the road. Elevate your Ténéré 700 experience with a captivating sequence of LEDs meticulously designed to improve visibility and showcase the distinctive style of your Yamaha. Crafted for seamless integration, this rear blinker set not only signals every move but also makes a bold statement. Ride with confidence as the sequential LED display adds an extra layer of sophistication to your Ténéré 700, ensuring you make a lasting impression on every journey. Immerse yourself in the perfect fusion of safety and style with Yamaha's Rear Sequential LED Blinker Ensemble tailored for the Ténéré 700.
description.sl-SI: Predstavljamo Yamahin komplet zadnjih sekvenčnih LED utripalk za Ténéré 700 - na novo opredeljuje varnost in eleganco na cesti. Izboljšajte svoje doživetje pri Ténéréju 700 z očarljivim zaporedjem diod LED, ki so skrbno oblikovane za izboljšanje vidljivosti in predstavitev značilnega sloga vaše Yamahe. Ta komplet zadnjih utripalnikov, izdelan za brezhibno integracijo, ne signalizira le vsakega giba, temveč daje tudi drzno izjavo. Vozite samozavestno, saj zaporedni prikaz LED dodaja vašemu Ténéréju 700 dodatno plast prefinjenosti in zagotavlja, da boste na vsakem potovanju naredili nepozaben vtis. Potopite se v popolno združitev varnosti in sloga z Yamahinim kompletom zadnjih sekvenčnih LED-blinkerjev, ki je prilagojen za Ténéré 700.

description.en: R6 Brake line set

You can also enjoy riding your XMAX during the cold and rainy days with the Winter Pack.  To keep your hands warm , whatever the condition, we have included the grip heaters, which are seamlessly integrated into the design. We also included the hand muffs to amp up the protections which by combining with the grip heaters, provide optimum protection against wind chill.  The Apron does an excellent job of protecting your lower body from the cold, wind and rain, including an integrated seat cover and a zip to detach the apron in warmer weather.   Available from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit these high quality Genuine Accessories to your XMAX.
description.sl-SI: Z zimskim paketom lahko v vožnji z vozilom XMAX uživate tudi v hladnih in deževnih dneh.  Grelniki ročk, ki so neopazno vgrajeni v zasnovo, ohranjajo vaše roke tople, ne glede na razmere. Vključili smo tudi mufe za roke za boljšo zaščito, ki s kombinacijo grelnikov ročk zagotavljajo optimalno zaščito pred hladnim vetrom.  Zaščita za sprednji del odlično zaščiti spodnji del telesa pred mrazom, vetrom in dežjem, vključno s prevleko za sedež in zadrgo, s katero lahko zaščito v toplejših vremenskih razmerah odstranite.   Obrnite se na pooblaščenega prodajalca izdelkov Yamaha, ki bo to visokokakovostno originalno dodatno opremo z veseljem namestil na vaše vozilo XMAX.

OM COVER F80D in F100F sta več kot le zaščitna pokrova; sta popolna mešanica sloga, vzdržljivosti in vrhunske zmogljivosti. Ne glede na to, ali želite zaščititi zunanje pohištvo, opremo ali druge dragocene predmete, ta pokrivala zagotavljajo popolno zaščito pred vremenskimi vplivi. Ne sklepajte kompromisov glede kakovosti. Izberite OM COVER F80D in F100F za zanesljivo, elegantno in dolgotrajno zaščito.
description.en: The OM COVER F80D and F100F are more than just protective covers; they are a perfect blend of style, durability, and superior performance. Whether you need to shield your outdoor furniture, equipment, or other valuable items, these covers deliver the ultimate defense against the elements. Don’t compromise on quality. Choose OM COVER F80D and F100F for reliable, stylish, and long-lasting protection.

name.sl-SI: Čistilo za čelade in vizirje Yamalube®

description.en: The residues from dust, dirt and countless insects are the penalty we pay for our riding enjoyment – and not just on our helmets and visors, but on headlights, windscreens and body parts too! These residues can be a visibility and safety issue as well as detracting from the visual appeal of our machines. This special cleaner solves the problem quickly – keep it in your backpack!
description.sl-SI: Ostanki prahu, umazanija in nešteto žuželk – ne samo na čeladah in vizirjih, ampak tudi na žarometih, vetrnih ščitih in delih telesa – so cena, ki jo plačujemo za naš užitek v vožnji. Omenjeni ostanki lahko otežijo vidljivost in predstavljajo varnostno tveganje, poleg tega pa negativno vplivajo na videz naših vozil. To posebno čistilo omenjene težave hitro reši – pospravite ga kar v nahrbtnik!

description.en: Foot rests in Titanium for GYTR Ténéré 700 World Raid

Yamalube Bike Grease is a calcium-based fluorescent yellow long-life grease that’s designed for use on your bike’s wheel bearings, joints and headset. The highly water repellent and pressure resistant formula provides effective lubrication – and as well as being elastomer friendly and seal friendly, it also prevents galvanic corrosion.
description.sl-SI: Mast za kolo Yamalube je fluorescentno rumena mast na osnovi kalcija z dolgo življenjsko dobo, ki je namenjena za uporabo na ležajih koles in spojih. Izjemno vodoodporna formula, odporna na tlak, zagotavlja učinkovito podmazovanje – poleg tega je blagodejna za elastomer in tesnilo, preprečuje tudi galvansko korozijo.

Yamalube® Power Trim & Steering Fluid je natančno uravnoteženo olje, ki združuje lastnosti proti koroziji in proti obrabi s stabilizatorji viskoznosti, zasnovano za podaljšanje življenjske dobe, kakovosti in zmogljivosti krmilnega sistema vaše ladje.
description.en: Yamalube® Power Trim & Steering Fluid is a finely balanced oil combining anti-corrosion and anti-wear qualities with viscosity stabilizers, designed to extend the life, quality and performance of your boat's steering system.

description.en:
Yamalube Cleaning Gel is an environmentally neutral, quick, and effective universal cleaner for cleaning motorbikes, Scooters, outboard engines, boats, etc. The optimized water-based formula is biodegradable and therefore environmentally friendly. 
Mode of use: Spray the entire vehicle with the "YAMALUBE Gel Cleaner", let it act for 5 minutes, then rinse it thoroughly with a strong jet of water. 
In case of extreme dirt (e.g., chain grease or encrusted oil) let it act for up to 30 minutes after application. Rinse it out until the foam stops coming out. If necessary, use a sponge.
description.sl-SI:
Čistilni gel Yamalube je okolju neškodljivo, hitro in učinkovito univerzalno čistilo za čiščenje motornih koles, skuterjev, izvenkrmnih motorjev, čolnov itd. Optimizirana formula na vodni osnovi je biorazgradljiva in zato okolju prijazna. 
Način uporabe: Celotno vozilo poškropite s čistilnim gelom YAMALUBE, pustite delovati 5 minut, nato temeljito sperite z močnim curkom vode. 
V primeru trdovratne umazanije (npr. maščoba na verigi ali zasušeno olje) pustite delovati do 30 minut po nanosu. Izpirajte, dokler pena ne preneha iztekati. Po potrebi uporabite gobico.

description.en: Yamalube 2R fully synthetic 2-stroke off road racing oil features a specially developed ester based formula to ensure highly efficient lubrication for optimum engine performance with enhanced durability. Posebni detergenti in razpršila spodbujajo čisto delovanje za dosledno visoke ravni zmogljivosti pri vsaki hitrosti agregata, rdečo barvilo pa potrjuje, da je bilo vaše gorivo predhodno zmešano in ste pripravljeni na odhod.

With its compact dimensions and the excellent fuel efficiency the NMAX thrives in the hustle and bustle of the urban environment. To ensure space and comfort, the Urban pack offers the best experience for riding in those built-up areas. The high screen provides robust protection against wind, while it remains resistant to scratches and impact damage thanks to its hard-coated polycarbonate design. The 39L top case offers all the extra space you need and rests on a beautiful piece of alloy rear carrier, with its integrated design and rigorous testing guaranteeing year-after-year security and peace of mind while riding. The lockset for the top case comes included in the pack, while the back rest provides the rear passenger with optimum comfort. The Urban pack will make the NMAX your best friend in the city. Available now from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit these high quality Genuine Accessories to your NMAX.
description.sl-SI: S kompaktnimi dimenzijami in odličnim izkoristkom goriva je model NMAX popolna izbira za uporabo v vrvežu urbanega okolja. Paket Urban zagotavlja dovolj prostora in udobja, zato omogoča kar najboljšo vožnjo po gosto pozidanih območjih. Visok vizir zagotavlja zanesljivo zaščito pred vetrom, zaradi polikarbonatne zasnove s trdo prevleko pa je odporen tudi na praske in poškodbe ob trku. 39-litrski zgornji kovček poskrbi za dodaten prostor, nameščen pa je na čudovitem zadnjem nosilcu iz zlitine. Z integrirano zasnovo in po izvedbi izjemno strogih testov zagotavlja varnost in brezskrbnost med vožnjo. Komplet ključavnice za zgornji kovček je priložen, naslon sedeža pa potniku zadaj omogoča optimalno udobje. S paketom Urban bo model NMAX postal vaš najboljši prijatelj za vožnjo po mestu. Obrnite se na pooblaščenega prodajalca izdelkov Yamaha, ki bo to visokokakovostno originalno dodatno opremo z veseljem namestil na vaš model NMAX.

Evoke the soul of the Dark Side of Japan, with the Sport Pack for the MT-10. 
Created to give you a full on immersive experience with your MT-10, the Sport Pack will catch your attention, while the Genuine accessories give your bike the sharp look.
Akrapovič exhaust takes the already attractive exhaust note and turns into aural delight. Did we mention the clean looks, increase in performance and the reduction in weight? Well those can also be attributed to the exhaust!
description.sl-SI:
S kompletom Sport Pack za vozilo MT-10 prebudite temno plat Japonske. 
Komplet Sport Pack je bil ustvarjen za zagotavljanje popolne vozne izkušnje z vašim modelom MT-10 in bo pritegnil vašo pozornost, originalna dodatna oprema pa bo poskrbela za agresiven videz vozila.
Akrapovičev izpuh pa že tako prijeten zvok izpuha ponese na popolnoma novo raven. Ali smo omenili čiste linije, boljšo učinkovitost in manjšo težo? Tudi te značilnosti lahko pripišemo omenjenemu izpuhu.

description.sl-SI:
Predstavljamo naše ekskluzivne ščitnike za roke, ki so skrbno izdelani z mislijo na dinamičnega kolesarja. Ti ščitniki so zasnovani za najbolj aktivne navdušence in se ponašajo z ergonomsko zasnovo, ki zagotavlja popolno prileganje. Ne le da zagotavljajo optimalno zaščito pred vetrom, temveč njihov stil zaprte zanke zagotavlja tudi izboljšano zaščito in vzdržljivost pred drobci. Izboljšajte svojo izkušnjo vožnje s popolno kombinacijo sloga in funkcionalnosti
 - še danes izberite naše edinstvene ščitnike za roke!
description.en:
Introducing our exclusive handguards, meticulously crafted with the dynamic rider in focus. Engineered for the most active enthusiasts, these handguards boast ergonomic design to ensure a perfect fit. Not only do they provide optimal wind protection, but their closed loop style also delivers enhanced safeguarding and durability against debris. Elevate your riding experience with the perfect blend of style and functionality
 – choose our unique handguards today!

description.sl-SI: Vozni položaj na motornem kolesu Ténéré 700 lahko preprosto znižate s kompletom za znižanje. Preprost jekleni komplet za povečanje dostopa do tal in prilagajanje vašega udobja.
description.en: Lower your Ténéré 700 riding position easily with the Low Link. A simple steel kit for increasing ground access and tailoring your comfort.
Stylish chromed hard plastic cover to embellish the fuel tank.

Kit that extends the base of the original Ténéré 700 side stand. Provides larger 'footprint' for stable parking, especially on soft ground. Extra convenient when using the optional Side Cases (sold separately).
description.sl-SI: Komplet, ki razširja podstavek izvirnega stranskega stojala Ténéré 700. Zagotavlja večjo »površino stojala« za stabilno parkiranje, še posebej na mehkih tleh. Izjemno priročen pri uporabi izbirnih stranskih kovčkov (naprodaj posebej).

Izboljšajte slog in zaščito Yamahinega modela TMAX z zaščito za konzolo – trdimi nalepkami, ki konzolo ščitijo pred praskami, skuterju pa dodajo športni pridih.
description.en: Add style and protection to your Yamaha TMAX with the Console Protection, hard-layer stickers that protect the console from scratches and add a sporty finish to your scooter.

description.en: Defend yourself and your UMX against mud, water, and debris with this four-piece kit. Designed to integrate perfectly with the hard-work-ready look and feel of the UMX. Kit includes all four (4) overfenders, mounting hardware and detailed installation instructions.

Conquer the urban landscape with the Tricity 300 Urban Pack which consists of the most essential accessories to make your ride even more practical. Available now from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit these high quality Genuine Accessories to your Tricity 300.
description.sl-SI: Osvojite urbano pokrajino s kompletom Tricity 300 'Urban Pack', ki vključuje najbolj bistvene dodatke, s katerimi bo vaša vožnja še bolj praktična. Obrnite se na pooblaščenega prodajalca izdelkov Yamaha, ki bo to visokokakovostno originalno dodatno opremo z veseljem namestil na vaš model Tricity 300.

description.en: Heated comfort seat designed to increase the riding comfort over long distances for the TRACER 9. The firm foam base and the soft surface pouches make sure you can enjoy Touring at its best.
description.sl-SI: Ogrevan udoben sedež za TRACER 9, zasnovan za izboljšanje udobja med vožnjo na dolge razdalje. Čvrsta osnova iz pene ter mehki žepki na površini zagotavljajo, da boste med potovanjem kar najbolj uživali.

description.en: Take your audio experience to the next level with this FX Subwoofer, which delivers a nice punch, enhancing your audio experience. While it quickly connects, via Bluetooth,  to the EcoXGear Speakers, it is powered by the WaveRunner battery.
description.sl-SI: Zagotovite si vrhunsko izkušnjo zvoka z globokotonskim zvočnikom za FX, ki omogoča močne zvočne učinke in izboljšano izkušnjo poslušanja. Z zvočniki EcoXGear se hitro poveže prek Bluetootha, napaja pa ga akumulator skuterja WaveRunner.

Debossed MT-07 logo in the screen surface.

name.sl-SI: Wolverine® X2 850 – paket za mehko kabino

description.en: Upgrade your Side-by-Side with the Soft Cabin Pack for the Wolverine® X2 850. Pack includes: Fixed Poly Windshield, Soft Cover Rear Window and Soft Side Covers.
description.sl-SI: Nadgradite svoj model Side-by-Side s paketom za mehko kabino za model Wolverine® X2 850. Paket vključuje: fiksno polikarbonatno vetrobransko steklo, mehko prevleko za zadnje okno in mehke stranske pokrove.

description.en: GYTR Spoke Rear Wheel.

description.sl-SI: Paket TRACER 9 GT 'Travel Pack' vsebuje ustrezne dodatke, ki poskrbijo za večje udobje na dolgih vožnjah. Visok vizir še bolje ščiti pred vetrom in drugimi vplivi ter vozniku zagotavlja prijeten položaj. Udoben sedež poskrbi za večje udobje pri daljšem sedenju, zato je to dobra izbira za dolge vožnje. Zgornji kovček in vsi dodatki, potrebni za namestitev, zagotavljajo neverjeten 45-litrski dodatni prostor za shranjevanje, kamor lahko shranite dve integralni čeladi. Kovček lahko dodatno prilagodite tako, da se barvna plošča ujema z barvo modela TRACER 9 GT.
description.en: For added comfort during long distance Touring, the TRACER 9 GT Travel Pack provides your motorcycle with just the right extra touches. The High Screen deflects even more wind and elements to provide the rider a pleasant protected position. The Comfort Seat is there to increase the comfort of seating for a longer period of time, making it an excellent addition for longer rides. The Top Case and all accessories needed to mount it provide an incredible 45 L extra storage space that can house two full face helmets if needed. The case can also be detailed to perfection with a color plate to match the color of your TRACER 9 GT.

description.sl-SI: Čistilo za zavore Yamalube® je idealno za čiščenje in razmaščevanje zavor in komponent sklopke ter drugih delov. Posebna formula, ki ni jedka, hitro raztopi olje, mast, katran, zavorno tekočino ter umazanijo in je varna za uporabo na gumi, plastiki in barvi.
description.en: Yamalube® Brake Cleaner is ideal for degreasing and cleaning brake, clutch and other components. Its non-corrosive formula rapidly dissolves oil, grease, tar, brake fluid and dirt and is safe to use on rubber, plastic and paint.
Radiator guard for Ténéré 700 World Raid GYTR

name.sl-SI: Kovinski pokrov posode za motorno olje

description.en: Rim Sticker Set for 1 Wheel (Rear).

description.en: Soft side bags featuring semi-hard lids and reflective grey piping. 14L volume per bag (expandable to 21L per bag). The bags attach firmly thanks to strong Velcro closure strips.
description.sl-SI: Mehke stranske torbe, ki imajo poltrde pokrove in odsevne sive obrobe. 14 l na torbo (razširljivo do 21 l na torbo). Torbe so čvrsto pritrjene z močnimi trakovi Velcro.

description.en: This system not only enhances the looks of your R7 with its sophisticated design, but also improves performance and generates an exciting sound.
description.sl-SI: Ta sistem ne izboljša le videza vašega R7 s svojim prefinjenim dizajnom, ampak tudi izboljša zmogljivost in ustvari razburljiv zvok.

name.sl-SI: Komplet Sport Pack Pro za MT-07

description.sl-SI: Za voznike, ki želijo maksimalno izkoristiti svoje motorno kolo MT-07, smo pripravili komplet Sport Pack Pro. Poleg vseh prednosti, ki jih ponuja komplet Sport Pack, Sport Pack Pro vključuje še nekaj pozorno izbranih dodatkov iz naše ponudbe. Celoten izpušni sistem Akrapovič zagotavlja večje zmogljivosti in vrhunsko izkušnjo zvoka, za izjemno upravljanje pa je dodano še zadnje vzmetenje Öhlins. Skupaj s hitrim menjalnikom, stranskim oblazinjenjem rezervoarja, nosilcem registrske tablice in zaporednimi smerniki, ta paket popelje vašo vožnjo na vrhunsko raven in daje vašemu MT-07 značilen športni videz.
description.en: For riders who want the maximum out of their MT-07, we put together the Sport Pack Pro. Along with all the goodies that the Sport Pack has to offer, the Sport Pack Pro adds in a few more carefully selected accessories from our range. The full system Akrapovič exhaust provides increased performance and a visceral sound experience, whereas the Öhlins rear suspension has been added for superior handling. Together with the quickshifter, side tank pads, licence plate holder and sequential blinkers, this pack takes your ride to the ultimate level and gives your MT-07 a distinctive sporty look.
Kit required when fitting the High Screen.
description.sl-SI: Za namestitev visokega vizirja je zahtevan komplet.

description.en: Stylish flashers to replace the standard ones.
description.sl-SI: Moderni smerniki za zamenjavo standardnih.

description.en: Unveiling Yamaha's Rear Sequential LED Blinker Set – Redefining safety and elegance on the road. Elevate your ride with a mesmerizing sequence of LEDs designed to enhance visibility and showcase your Yamaha's distinctive style. Meticulously engineered for seamless integration, these rear blinkers not only signal your every move but also make a powerful statement. Ride with confidence as the sequential LED display adds an extra layer of sophistication to your Yamaha, ensuring you leave a lasting impression wherever your journey takes you. Experience safety and style harmoniously with Yamaha's Rear Sequential LED Blinker Set.
description.sl-SI: Predstavitev Yamahinega kompleta zadnjih sekvenčnih LED utripalk - nova definicija varnosti in elegance na cesti. Svojo vožnjo povzdignite s hipnotičnim zaporedjem diod LED, zasnovanim za izboljšanje vidljivosti in predstavitev značilnega sloga vaše Yamahe. Ti zadnji utripalniki, skrbno izdelani za brezhibno integracijo, ne sporočajo le vsakega vašega koraka, temveč dajejo tudi močno izjavo. Vozite samozavestno, saj zaporedni prikaz LED dodaja vaši Yamahi dodatno plast prefinjenosti in zagotavlja, da boste pustili trajen vtis, kamorkoli vas bo pot zanesla. Doživite varnost in slog v harmoniji z Yamahinim kompletom zadnjih sekvenčnih utripalnikov LED.
Izboljšajte športni videz svoje Yamahe R9 z zatemnjenim vizirjem. Enostavna zamenjava standardnega vizirja, zasnovanega z UV zaščito z elegantnim vgraviranim logotipom R.
description.en: Enhance the sporty look of your Yamaha R9 with the Smoke Windscreen. An easy replacement of the standard screen engineered with UV-protection treatment featuring an elegant debossed R logo.

description.sl-SI: Nizki sedež v črni barvi, ekskluzivno zasnovan za Ténéré 700, omogoča boljši dostop do tal za večjo varnost voznika. Ujema se z zasnovo originalnega sedeža za brezhibno oblikovanje.
description.en: Designed exclusively for the Ténéré 700, the Low Seat Black improves ground access for enhanced rider safety. Matches the design of the original seat for seamless styling.
4th Wheel kit for GYTR® gears.

description.sl-SI: Naši ščitniki zavornih ročic so zasnovani tako, da nudijo neprekosljivo zaščito vaših ročic. Ne glede na to, ali se vozite po ostrih ovinkih ali se soočate z nepričakovanimi neravninami, naši ščitniki zagotavljajo, da vaše zavorne ročice ostanejo nedotaknjene.
description.en: Our brake lever guards are designed to offer unbeatable protection for your levers. Whether you’re navigating tight turns or facing unexpected bumps, our guards ensure your brake levers stay intact.

description.en: V-Force Carbon Fibre Reed Valves are designed to deliver an optimized airflow and effective sealing for increased performance across the rpm range. One of the quickest and easiest ways to get more race-winning power from your  YZ model.
description.sl-SI: Sesalne lamele V-Force iz karbonskih vlaken so oblikovane tako, da zagotavljajo optimiziran pretok zraka in učinkovito tesnjenje za največjo učinkovitost pri vseh vrtljajih motorja. Eden od najhitrejših in najpreprostejših načinov, da iz svojega modela YZ izvabite več zmagovalne moči.

description.en: Lower side case stay for NIKEN hard cases

Built from Ultra High Molecular Weight Polyethylene (UHMWPE), this Skid Plate resists damage and helps the Wolverine easily slide over rocks. Steel or aluminum skid plates are loud and can bend and gouge while tackling rugged terrain, but these UHMWPE plates provide expectational protection while maintaining their integrity.
description.sl-SI: Ta ščitna plošča, ki je narejena iz polietilena z ultra visoko molekularno težo (UHMWPE), ščiti pred poškodbami in pomaga Wolverinu, da enostavno zdrsne čez skale. Jeklene ali aluminijaste ščitne plošče so glasne in se lahko zvijejo ali upognejo pri vožnji čez neraven teren, plošče iz UHMWPE pa zagotavljajo izredno zaščito in obenem ohranijo svojo integriteto.

Mineralno olje za štiritaktnike Yamalube® 20W50 je zasnovano za štiritaktna motorna kolesa z mokro sklopko. Ustvari edinstven film, s katerim zmanjšuje trenje in podaljšuje življenjsko dobo motorja ter ščiti pred korozijo, penjenjem in oksidacijo.
description.en: Yamalube® Mineral 20W50 4-Stroke Oil is designed for 4-stroke motorcycles with oil-soaked clutches. By creating a unique film it decreases friction and prolongs engine life, protecting against corrosion, foaming and oxidation.

description.en: You can intensify the sporty spirit of your XMAX with the Sport Pack consisting of a sport screen, license plate holder, aluminium adjustable levers and aluminium foot panels – the perfect combination of sport style and flair. Make it truly yours by adding optional Gilles , Akrapovič and Ohlin’s parts. Available from your Yamaha dealer who will be happy to fit these high quality Genuine Accessories to your XMAX.
description.sl-SI: Športni duh vašega vozila XMAX lahko okrepite s športnim paketom, ki vključuje športni vizir, nosilec registrske tablice, aluminijaste prilagodljive ročice in aluminijaste plošče stopalk – popolna kombinacija športnega sloga in elegance. Svojemu vozilu dodajte dele družb Gilles, Akrapovič in Ohlin ter ga tako povsem prilagodite svojemu okusu. Obrnite se na pooblaščenega prodajalca izdelkov Yamaha, ki bo to visokokakovostno originalno dodatno opremo z veseljem namestil na vaše vozilo XMAX.
Kakovosten zadnji nosilec za 39-litrski in 50-litrski zgornji kovček iz aluminija.

name.sl-SI: Čistilni robčki za čelade in vizirje Yamalube®
name.en: Yamalube® Visor and Helmet Cleaner Wipes

description.sl-SI: Ostanki prahu, umazanija in nešteto žuželk – ne samo na čeladah in vizirjih, ampak tudi na žarometih in vetrnih ščitih – so cena, ki jo plačujemo za naš užitek v vožnji. Omenjeni ostanki lahko otežijo vidljivost in predstavljajo varnostno tveganje, vendar ti priročni vlažni robčki (z vključeno krpo za poliranje) to težavo hitro rešijo – pospravite jih kar v nahrbtnik!
description.en: The residues from dust, dirt and countless insects are the penalty we pay for our riding enjoyment – and not just on our helmets and visors, but on headlights and windscreens too! This can be a visibility and safety issue, but these handy wipes (with the polishing cloth included) solve the problem quickly – so keep them in your backpack!

name.en: Hard Cab Enclosure System Glass Rear Window
name.sl-SI: Stekleno zadnje okno kompleta za zapiranje kabine v trdi izvedbi

description.en: Yamaha is offering all the components of the Hard Cab Enclosure System separately for added customer convenience. Accessing the cargo area is one of the key factors in the fully functional Wolverine X4. This glass rear window opens utilizing familiar gas struts like those of a SUV to hold the glass up while the window is open (window must be closed while in drive).The fully lockable window keeps your items secure from unwanted company. When paired with the Rear Cargo Box to maximize rear cargo space, you have a truly versatile package ready to conquer the outdoors!
description.sl-SI: Yamaha za lažjo uporabo vse sestavne dele kompleta za zapiranje kabine v trdi izvedbi ponuja ločeno. Ena ključnih značilnosti polnofunkcionalnega modela Wolverine X4 je dostop do prtljažnega prostora. To stekleno zadnje okno se odpre s pomočjo že poznanih plinskih vzmeti, kot so tiste pri športnih terencih, ki zadržijo steklo v zgornjem položaju, ko je okno odprto (med vožnjo mora biti okno zaprto). Ker se da okno v celoti zakleniti, so vaši predmeti varni pred nepridipravi. Če uporabljate zadnji tovorni kovček, ki poveča prtljažni prostor zadaj, je vaš vsestranski paket opreme pripravljen na dogodivščine na prostem!

Stranska ogledala, ki jih je zasnovala, razvila in preizkusila Yamaha, zagotavljajo odličen pogled in najboljšo vzdržljivost. Širokokotno stekleno območje za pogled brez popačenja zagotavlja veliko jasnost in vidnost zadaj. Zlaganje v avtomobilskem slogu zagotavlja dodatno udobje pri vleki zaprtih prikolic ali na tesnih poteh, saj po ponovnem odpiranju ogledal ni treba znova prilagajati vidnega polja. Izjemno trpežne tlačno lite aluminijaste osi zagotavljajo trpežnost, ki jo pričakujete od Yamahe.
description.en: The Yamaha-designed, developed, and tested Side View Mirrors provide an excellent view and unmatched durability. The wide-angle, distortion-free glass viewing area provides great clarity and rearward visibility. Automotive-style fold-away action provides added convenience when pulling in enclosed trailers or on tight trails by reducing the need to readjust the viewing area after folding back. Ultra-tough die-cast aluminum pivots provide the durability you come to expect from Yamaha.

description.en: Öhlins front fork springs are developed specifically for Öhlins cartridge NIX30 kits and front forks. But they are also in itself a great front end upgrade and option to improve responsiveness and performance of the fork. Öhlins zagotavlja širok nabor linearnih vzmeti, ki so primerne za vsako posamezno vrsto motornega kolesa, težo voznika in osebne želje za namestitev v standardne sprednje vilice.

description.en: Öhlins Cartridge FKA114
description.sl-SI: Vložki Öhlins FKA114

description.en: Stylish chromed main stand to replace the original and to complete the classic contemporary look of the D'elight.

Specially designed roller protection for CP3 engines. This three point stable fixation slider will limit damage done to your engine during a low sider. The protection is made from machined anodised aluminium  and features a Yamaha logo for that styling finish.
description.sl-SI: Posebej zasnovana zaščita za valjčke za motorje CP3. Ta tritočkovni stabilni pritrdilni drsnik bo omejil poškodbe motorja pri zdrsu. Ta zaščita je izdelana iz strojno obdelanega anodiziranega aluminija in ima logotip Yamaha za zagotavljanje športnega končnega videza.

description.en: Higher and wider screen for enhanced wind protection on long-distance touring.
description.sl-SI: Višji in širši vizir za boljšo zaščito pred vetrom na dolgih vožnjah.

name.en: Outboard Engine Vented Splash Cover (F115 and F130)
name.sl-SI: Zaščitna prevleka za izvenkrmne motorje s prezračevanjem

description.en: Designed to be fitted while using your engine, this cover provides the ultimate protection against scratches and UV rays. The tight fit allows on and off water usage. Perfect on the waves, perfect on the trailer.
description.sl-SI: Ta prevleka je zasnovana za namestitev med uporabo vašega skuterja in zagotavlja neprekosljivo zaščito pred praskami in UV-žarki. Tesno prileganj prevleke omogoča nameščanje na vodi ali na kopnem. Odlična na valovih, odlična na prikolici.

description.en: Electrical heated hand grips to replace the standard unit grips
description.sl-SI: Električno ogrevane ročke, ki nadomeščajo standardne ročke

description.en: Anodized aluminium foot plates with rubber pad for an added stylish look.
description.sl-SI: Anodizirane aluminijaste stopalke z gumijasto blazinico za bolj eleganten videz.

Popolnoma sintetično olje Yamalube® 15W50 za štiritaktne motorje je visoko zmogljiva rešitev za športna, cestna in terenska motorna kolesa, skuterje, ATV-je ter štirikolesnike s štiritaktnim motorjem. Odlična vsestranska zaščita ločenih in vgrajenih menjalnikov ter mokrih sklopk, tudi pri ekstremnih vrtljajih in temperaturah.
description.en: Yamalube® Fully Synthetic 15W50 4-Stroke Oil is the high-performance solution for 4-stroke sports, road and off-road motorcycles, scooters, ATVs and quads. Excellent all-round protection for separate and integrated gearboxes and wet clutches, even at extreme revs and temperatures.
The licence plate holder replaces the original one, giving your MT-09 a sharper and sportier look.
description.sl-SI: Nosilec registrske tablice nadomešča originalnega in daje vašemu motociklu MT-09 bolj drzen in športen videz.

description.en: Reflective 3M sticker for rims of the front wheel
description.sl-SI: Odsevna nalepka 3M za platišče sprednjega kolesa

name.sl-SI: Komplet za ponovno zatesnitev dušilnika GYTR®

description.en: Easy to install Silencer Repack Kit ensures peak power delivery and minimizes noise output.
description.sl-SI: Komplet za ponovno zatesnitev dušilnika je preprost za namestitev in poskrbi za največjo zmogljivost ter zmanjša izhodni hrup.
